Is the Vintage Bose 901 Speakers from the 70’s (but nothing can beat those vintage beasts speakers) Its Tiny. But Mighty As Heck so far! I look forward to the many memories ill have with it! Love the candy apple red too!

This thing wants me to select English every time DURN time it is turned on. It wants access to my contacts. FNCK THAT. Dont get this thing if you like privacy. Dont get this if you want EASE OF USE. NO BRO. This thing wants you to have babies under its strobe lights. But you can only fnck at the speed depicted on the box. FNCK THIS THING I WANT TO BREAK IT. I owned the other version before they added all the needed linking of everything and it was wonderful. DONT BUY THIS THING. It sound like you need to turn it down ALL THE TIME. It cant handle anything being played at a reasonable level. NOTHING. I tried ALL the music. ALL OF IT. Fnch this thing and FNCK BOSE for making it. Finally a bose product I can HATE.

We purchased this speaker a little over 2 years ago but our outdoor oasis wasn't finished when expected so only began using it in Aptil 2019. The sound was good (although I wish it were louder), held a good charge, easy to transport, etc. Overall a good little speaker for the yard, until it wasn't. Went to use it this year and it won't turn on, won't charge, nothing. I expect more for $100+ speaker that is meant to be mobile and outdoors (was always dry and shaded) and I expect more from BOSE. If you are looking for a short term relationship with your speaker, go with this otherwise find something else.

The yellow is somewhat unsightly...but I use it in a fairly open space (hangar) where people come and go.  Much less likely to "sprout legs" and walk away with the bright color.  I have zero problems pairing with my iphone.  Battery life seems good.  I never tested how long though.  My use is always near a USB plug.  Highly recommended

I've had a fake JBL from Thailand for years and when I finally had battery problems with it I got the Bose thinking that it would be a better sound quality.  It is not particularly loud, and when it goes beyond its moderate volume it makes a crackling sound.  Disappointing from this brand.  The bluetooth connection is also a bit annoying.  It only half connects the first time, so I have to connect twice for the sound to come through. Again, I expected more from a premium brand.

I use this speaker everyday at work, I bought it in November and now that it's been a little over 6 months the speaker will not display that's it's charging or show any sign of a charging battery like it used to  love this thing, it's loud and awesome for chilling at the pool or lake with a hammock and plenty of range, hope Bose or Amazon will help me with this problem because these speakers aren't cheap.
Worth every penny. No other sound compares to Dr. Bose speakers. I have a sound bar for my TV too. It's the very best sound bar you can get. Bose. You get what you pay for 😉

Nice sounding speaker. We leave it on the bathroom counter and listen while in the shower. I probably paid a bit much for this type of use. With a bathroom fan and shower running together, why would one care about the sound quality? If you leave it in the kitchen maybe you'd be better served by this device. I'm keeping it, but next time I think I'll try something cheaper first. God knows there are plenty of cheaper ones out there.
Got it today, grabbed the charger and went to plug it it and the charger caught on fire. I can only think what would have happened if I walked away after plugging it in. Like wtf....

Like every Bose product I have owned it lived up to the standard, this thing has been dropped, kicked, and has come as far as to have been splashed with water and it is still kicking. The sound quality is great and the battery can last hours on end. I would definitely recommend you buy this if you are looking for a high quality portable speaker.

The sound is mediocre, and it's quite big. It does have a lot of bass though, so if you like that. It's also on the heavy side. Its shape made it hard to carry around, and the rubber feels sort of slippery. I really like the midnight blue color though, which is one of the reasons why I wanted to get this in the first place.

It is extremely difficult to link the two speakers per the app. I responded to a request from Bose to rate the app by asking for communication from them to no avail. In attempting to link the two speakers, one cannot find the other until a second or third attempt during which time I have to plug in a fully charged speaker so the speaker is recognized and then it shuts down and I cannot turn it on again until I unplug it and plug it in to the receptacle again and sometimes this allows the speaker to connect. It seems to me that it's the app but don't know. I would avoid this speaker if I were you, now I'm stuck trying multiple times to hear tunes. It's exceedingly disappointing that Bose would have a product that functions as this product does.

We should have paid attention to the reviews saying the battery quits quickly and permanently. We thought this was a pretty nice speaker until last week. We purchased it last Fall for use at our daughter’s wedding to play a custom music mix, and it worked like a champ. Since then we’d only used it occasionally to sit out on the deck and listen to music or when camping. Then we went to make sure it was ready for playing Halloween music for the trick or treaters this week. When we plugged it in to charge, at first it said battery low, and we assumed it would charge the unit from that point. Wrong. It is dead as a door nail. No lights, no voice response, no indication of charging after multiple times leaving it plugged in to charge and moving it multiple times to other outlets to make sure that was not the problem. Convenient that we discovered it had died too late— 2 WEEKS AFTER THE WARRANTY EXPIRATION (we purchased it October 11, 2016). More than likely it’s been dead for a couple of months but we just didn’t notice it as we hadn’t had occasion to use it.  Needless to say, we are less than happy about paying $129 for an electronic device that was very lightly used and lasted for barely a year, if that. I thought Bose was supposed to be synonymous with quality. Why such a short warranty? If you are confident in the quality of your electronic product, it should have at least a 3 year warranty. The one-year warranty tells me that they KNOW there’s a strong chance these are going to go belly up by one year.

I have a JBL Flip and love it, however, I wanted to buy one for my boyfriend.  He loves BOSE so I went with the more expensive option due to the brand and thought it would sound better.  The sound is good but the JBL is way better and cheaper.  Side by side, the bass and treble are not as good as with the JBL.  I thought there was an adjustment that could be made but no luck.  If I had to do it over again, I would have ordered the JBL.

Purchased this wireless bluetooth speaker as a second speaker to be used with my 60" flat screen Samsung TV.  Instruction manual consists of four short, confusing sentences in 6 languages with no explanation of buttons.  Eventually it paired with my TV, but there was a bad echo with my built in wired TV speaker.  Called Bose customer service and was told the TV speaker is the echo, not the Bose!  They said the Bose speaker should not be used with TVs!Bose used to make good products, but no longer.  Buy another brand.

I was hoping to upgrade from my 3y.o. Oontz (which I love) because it seemed the battery capacity was dropping.  In comparison, the capacity of this brand new Bose 2 appears to have STARTED low. Still, the Bose sound quality is excellent, especially the bass, and BT connectivity is outstanding and immediate.  I like it, but don't love it.
I really like this little speaker, however, the battery life is the pits! With regular use it would need to be recharged everyday. It also appears to loose charge quickly when it is not in use.

Read the reviews. I drive for UPS and have been looking for something quality to listen to keep from going crazy. I got this thing in the mail charged it all night took it to work and the battery lasted 15 minutes at most. Far from the 8 hours it says it lasts. I thought BOSE was quality. Guess not

From day one this speaker did not have the sound that we expected from a Bose.  We have had it 1 month and probably have not listened to it more than 10 hours total.  We had it on last night and it started crackling and then it died and would not come back on.  Thinking it needed to be charged we put it on the charger - nothing.  Will not turn back on, no lights, no nothing.  Returning it for a refund - will probably go back to JBL.  Totally bummed - was really excited about getting the Bose.

I love my Bose Soundlink.  I have hearing issues and this amplifies sound for my iPad and iPhone.  The sound is exceptional and I use it for watching movies and listening to music.  I love the size, shape and texture.  The silicone covering makes it easy to grab and go.The battery life seems to be adequate...I have never had an issue with it losing power.

I much prefer the original Soundlink Color, the newest version is a bit too bassy for my taste.  The original had a sound that was a bit more natural.  Also, the rubbery plastic material used for this speaker has a rather unpleasant odor to it.  In short I think the first version of the Soundlink Color is the way to go, even though it isn't splash proof.

These little speakers are AMAZING. Especially in stereo mode... I bought two because they can be paired, and I’m SUPER impressed. I don’t know how Bose does it... the sound is incredible. If you’re considering these speakers, know you will be impressed. Seriously impressed. Just, wow.
It's a good little device - BUT they really should ship it with a power cord - what's that cost them - an additional 5 bucks?

You have to get used to finagling 10, 15% of time to get Bose Connect app working on 1st try...but 90% of time it is FABULOUS especially for TWO MATCHING BOSE speakers positioned in hard to reach locales like a high shelf.  Also...take two speakers into your car for STEREO ... for anything online like music or news like Dr. Maddow, Stitcher, Pandora, YouTube etc...

No, this will not replace your home stereo system, but paired with an iPad, and its portability--it's freaking awesome for the price. Like most Bose speakers, it emphasizes the bass but otherwise has a pretty decent sound across the frequency range. I love that I can pair this with my iPhone when I'm working in my shop and control the volume levels from a device in my pocket. Super happy with the SoundLink Color II. Would purchase again.

The sound quality was good.  Not great but good.  The bluetooth connection worked seamlessly in both the set-up and thereafter.  Every time I turned on the speaker near the phone it connected immediately.  A voice confirmed the connection and the battery level.  However the speakerphone was lousy.  Everybody complained about crackling on the line and my audio fading in and out.  I returned the unit to Amazon.

Very easy to set up and very good sound quality. It’s also very portable and easy to take with you and use outside. I’ve used it on the tennis courts while playing and it’s really fun. I’ve used it on the tennis courts while playing and it’s really fun. I’m very happy with this product.

The sound of this speaker is as to be expected from a Bose. The purpose that I purchased this one was to link it with another bose speaker. Together in stereo mode,these 2 speakers are outstanding the battery life is at full volume is not as good as I would like it to be. The only real problem that I have with the speakers is that when you get out of bluetooth range while in stereo mode, they will not reconnect. You have to go through the whole process of turning the speakers off and then back on to reconnect to the device. Then you have to go through the steps of reconnecting the speakers together in stereo mode.

I bought this for our boat. I could not believe the price was so low for a Bose bluetooth speaker.  The sound quality is superb.  It’s water proof , compact and pumps out the sound in the clarity you expect.Great for the pool side or beach.  I would high recommend this product.

This is suppose to be a Bose speaker... this thing sucks. I have 2 for work and I regret that choice. the battery life sucks and now have had one completely fry out on me. I have had them less then a year. I cant have them connect together on the Bose app for "party mode" cuz they blip in and out.

I tried to get  help to connect this speaker to my iPhone, but no dice.  Couldn't get Bose to answer and clearly, the directions weren't adequeate.  Just a little one page showing the different switches.  Finally gave it to Goodwill.

I bought this speaker to bring music to other rooms when I'm cooking or cleaning. Bose has an excellent reputation for sound reproduction, and this item lives up to that reputation. The surface has a pleasing "rubber suede" feel.

A BOSE system doesn't come with a wall charger, but the first step in the instructions is that you need to BUY one separately?  Are we seriously selling items wherein the charging plug is not provided?  I have much cheaper speakers that actually provide ALL the parts needed to actually use it.This is nonsense and Bose should be ashamed of itself.  Now, I will return this and buy something that is actually reasonably priced and comes with all the parts needed to simply CHARGE it and USE it.  DO NOT BUY THIS.

I myself did not listen to other reviews on this page, thinking, "oh, maybe they just didn't know how to properly use the product." Not the case. This is not your typical Bose product - I purchased this in July 2019 on Prime Day. By December, this speaker stopped working altogether. Please, save your money and look elsewhere to buy a Bose speaker or any Bluetooth speaker for that matter. *Also, wanted to note that when this speaker actually worked (and briefly), that neighbors phones would randomly connect to this speaker while playing music. Zero bass, top volume is weak to put it nicely, and the battery life on full charger would last about an hour. AVOID THIS PRODUCT.

Don’t buy item lasted less then 30 days then I tried to work with both Amazon and Bose tech support to get it replaced and felt like I was in pre-school. I know not everyone is a computer tech, but if I already told you I tried multiple cables, outlets, and power blocks - don’t ask me to do it again. After three unsuccessful attempts to get it replaced I am going against Amazon recommendations and sending it back.

This is the second Bose soundlink speaker we have had. This one lasted a couple of months... there won't be another one. It will not charge. Same thing happened with the last one as well. So it's not a fluke. Also will not power on with the cable to power source. They're done, and so am I.

This speaker was great at first, but once I tried connecting both my phone and my Alexa to it, the connection sucked ever since. It’s pretty odd. The battery life is also very disappointing. I feel like it’s always dead. I had an off brand speaker this was purchased to replace after the other speaker gave years of great sound, and I wish I had gone with a cheaper product now.

I have no one to talk to so I'll send a review...I bought this for my son and had said at the time I ordered the speaker I wanted to take out a 3 yr warranty. The speaker is not holding a charge at all. I went to my acct and not looking like I have that warranty and would like to know why....I always take warranty's pit on any type of devises like this...Please get back to me and explain how this happened....Thank you (he has been pleased with the speaker and takes care of his stuff, but it's just not holding a charge at this point)

We have ours hooked up to the little flatscreen TV in our kitchen and the sound is so much better the TV's built-in speaker. The size it great for the counter top. I have the next model up in my art studio for music and it does sound a lot better but for the price and how we are using it, it is perfect.

I ordered this because I have another one just like it. We use it at work. Multiple people easily connect with it and the sound is better quality and louder than other speakers we have tried. I love it! We’ve been using the other one at least two years and it’s still going strong after heavy use.
No sound, tried to reset both speaker and phone. Tried to hook up directly to cable. Says speaker is connect yet no sound.

I wanted to give my daughter a quality bluetooth speaker but didn't want to spend too much. This one fit the bill for our budget.I have other bluetooth speakers from JAM and DOSS.  This Bose sounds better than both of those.  Noticeably better.  We put the Bose right next to the DOSS and the difference was amazing.  Of course, the DOSS costs about $30, so there's that.  But the sound is really good.  My daughter uses it mainly in her room.  It's plenty loud to be used in our open kitchen/living room/dining room area.  You're not going to shake the windows with the bass - but if you are looking for a well constructed and great sounding bluetooth speaker I would recommend the Bose.

I understand the fact that, this is a used product. However, when I received the parcel, the box was ruined by the water. I thought it's okay it happens sometimes, but later I tried to turn ON the speaker I realized that button was not working correctly. I was trying to convince myself looking at the deal price that this speaker is excellent. The speaker is not working correctly; the button is not right. You need to press very hard to turn ON or OFF, sometimes even pushing hard does not also work.However, now we have purchased this item and wanted to return it. We need to pay to return this item.

Good sound quality but NOT ENOUGH VOLUME!  Like portability & water resistance but want more VOLUME.Update:  we have rarely used this speaker since the volume is so low.  Should have returned it while it was new.  Also, I would only give it 2 stars.  Sound quality good in a quiet room & waterproofness merit 2 stars.

My previous outdoor speaker that I paid maybe $20 for just officially died on me and I was SO bummed to need to replace it because I thought I loved it. No, no. I am in LOVE with this little bose. It has phenomenal speaker quality, great volume, super lightweight, waterproof?! Need I say more? Just buy it if you need something for beach to backyard. Love it!

The sound is so unnatural and immersed in too much base that it hurt my ears and brain. Especially, people that are accustomed to audiophile sound, will either get disappointed or angry that this "box" called Bose Bluetooth speaker exists. If you think you must get a Bluetooth speaker, then B&W T7 will be a much better choice. (PS. This Bose should have been priced at less than $50 with the sound quality that it offers. Go Barca! Peace.

The sound is good (considering the brand), but the functionality leaves something to be desired.  It's difficult to pair--and to stay paired.  Also, it'll only charge with the cable that came with the unit.  I tried other cables (for example, the ones I use with everything but my iPhone), but the unit wouldn't charge.  What am I supposed to do if the Bose cable gets lost or damaged?  No thanks.  I'm sending it back.

This is my first Bose item and I love it.  The Bluetooth connection through the Bose app was so simple.  The sound quality is amazing, rich, and clear.  It connects to my phone automatically when turned on and if no music is played through it for about 30 minutes, it turns itself off to save the battery.  Love it.

I bought this for myself as a Christmas gift and I really love having it in the bathroom to use for my morning showers. The clarity is great over the sound of the running water. My only complaints are that the battery life doesn’t seem to be too great, so if you’re planning on traveling with it, it might not be the best option. I also wish that it was easier to adjust the volume on the speaker itself. The buttons can be a bit confusing so I usually end up changing the volume from my phone. But I love the color and the size and it’s a great speaker for a bathroom!

Yo so I get this dope little sound canon and the bottom came undone. I saw it and was like whatever cause it’s Bose, it’ll still sound decent. Only it does rattle cause the bass is so good and the part that’s loose is up front. The best part in all this is AMAZON. I was trying to live with it but ima bit of a sound magician (catch me @808charm for sounds) I texted amazon support and the dude Komal hooked it up and went beyond to make things right. Amazon you got me in my feels today, I know it’s just a sound device but the dude really made my day and I just want Komal to be recognized because I closed the window too soon and couldn’t find the survey I requested.

I bought 5 of these units (1 for each kiddo and 1 for my small business office). The sound quality is the bomb! No crackling or muddiness at all, even when I'm blasting full volume Metallica through the office on the weekends! We have a warehouse that is 8500sf, and you can hear the sound clearly across the building.The Bluetooth feature allows easy play from iPhone and the volume controls on the phone easily control the speaker volume. It instantly silences when a phone call comes in.

This unit has power issues.  Fortunately one of the reviews shared a work around the defect/flaw.  But for how long before it completely stops powering on.  Amazon should refund my money as these dated reviews share this device has been flawed for years.  One demerit AMAZON— I feel cheated and embarrassed for having more confidence in Amazon than the customer reviews.  Live and Learn.  May 2020 purchase.
This product worked well with all of my devices, and produced an amazing sound! The only drawback is that it does not accept audio through the USB port as the Bose website says it does.

I bought this Bose because one of the speakers on my laptop failed. A friend has this same model which has been our tailgate staple, so I knew it would perform well and be loud enough without distortion. It also resists beer spills on the actual tailgate :)  When I BlueToothed the Bose to my laptop, there were no issues, except the weird feedback when using Google Meets; this did not happen with Zoom meetings or FaceTime ... to be fair, could be user error.I did buy the plug-in charger as well because I prefer to not charge items directly through my computer. Just might buy the case too.

I love this speaker. It has superior sound quality and can be taken anywhere. I carry this speaker all over the house and to work, travel, you name it. It’s great for on the go living because it’s small enough you can take it with you. The charge lasts a long time and the speaker communicates with you so you know the battery level at all times. Definitely worth the $.

Bought for our sumner home. This is my third Bose Soundlink. Used once. Returned to our home and tried to use my Bose. Dead,not working, and charged. Check out web reviews. Why isn't Bose honoring so many of the same disfunction of non-working expensive speakers?

I am returning this for another one. Right now I'm lucky if the battery lasts 3hrs on a full charge. I am hoping the new one I get through the warranty will be better. I will provide an update. Other than the battery I love this speaker. Update June 24 I got my replacement speaker. This time the battery lasts my 8 hr work day.

Gr8 sound though there is really no bass, nice long battery life, fast charge, feels durable but I'm not dropping it on the floor just to find out for this review...or for anything else. The speaker arrived on time and in gr8 shape and I also want to mention that the bluetooth is gr8. It was easy to figure out and now, after a long review, I'm gonna go vibe.

This is a very convenient and useful speaker. I have used it outside while having dinner on the patio and inside using it as a speaker for my iMac. So far I have not needed to charge it although I did buy a charger for it. It's very easy to set up for an iPhone. A Father's Day gift from my eldest son.

It serves its purpose, but it is super annoying. If you are linked up to anything via the Bluetooth, you need to proactively disconnect the connection when you were done using or every time your computer powers back on by itself when it's in sleep mode, the stupid Bose speaker turns back on by itself immediately. It is super annoying and there's no way to shut the damn thing off or to keep it from automatically turning on like that! annoying enough that I'm taking time out of my day to sit here and write you this review. Like, if I turn the stupid thing off, stay OFF!!!

Buyer beware. I should have read more reviews before purchasing. The sound is great. The maneuverability is great . . . that is, when it works. After almost exactly a year, I had the same battery issues as others. I tried the button reset and the software upgrade. Neither works. Now, I have a speaker that is a complete waste. Don’t buy! It’s an expensive speaker to only get one year use out of.

Compared to other smaller Bluetooth speakers, this one is still the best. However, I hold back one star because it still doesn't have the really high sound quality I was expecting from Bose. Still well worth the purchase, though :)
I love the sound this little box produces. The charger connection is a little “iffy” at times. The connection seems a little loose. And the case isn’t exactly aligned over the plug opening.

I had a Bose SOUNDLINK wireless speaker for several years.  It worked great, but the battery finally died so I ordered another one.  It was fine EXCEPT the volume control to turn volume up didn't work.  O.k. so I returned it to Amazon and had them send me a replacement.  Same problem, volume control didn't work.  I called Bose tech dept. and they told me "YES they are having a problem with that defect and are working on it and for me to return this one to Amazon for a refund".  However when I see the refund instructions, since this one was a "no charge replacement" the refund is zero.  THAT is not right.  They still have my first payment.  How do I contact their customer service and get this straightened out?  T. Johnson

I have bought two of these little, but big sound speakers. The first one was destroyed by a F350 7.3 4x4 dually.  I ran over it with a front wheel. Oops! It took awhile, but they went on sale again for $100.  I picked the second one up.Very satisfied.

Ordered & received within less than 24hrs!!! Bose certainly lives up to the quality of sound which it's known for. The base, clarity & volume range is spectacular!! A LOT of sound for such a compact size speaker. Super reasonably priced...you get a lot of bang for your buck. I'm beyond pleased & guarantee you will be too!

When I bought this I had already bought one from Best Buy(free gift cards) I love the sound quality.This unit died 13 months after I bought it. Warranty period expired by 1 month. The one from Best Buy is still working as of today. I looked at a lot of reviews about The Soundlink Color II. Most complaints are similar. The product doesn't last. I have a Bose stereo from the 1980"s, still going strong. I'm going to be buying JBL from now on. My sons have two portable speakers and so far great sound and no problems.

I have my phone and iPad connected to it. And if I play my speaker in the living room (where my wifi router is also there) and my phone and iPad are inside my room just 6 feet away, the speaker keep starts and stopping. Which really ruins my mood. For a price of 100 dollars, this feels unacceptable really. But the bluetooth works perfectly if my phone is right next to it and if I only connect one device to the speaker at a time.
-amazing sound projection for a small device-bass heavy sound

This is the only one I found that you can turn off the automatic 30 minute shut off.  I want to use it in my car with my phone for directions.  The other brand was returned because it could not be shut off.  Can make the volume loud, also.

I love this little speaker! The battery holds well, it’s very portable, but the sound quality is GREAT! I like Bose But I will admit not all products are created equally, but this one is a home run! You won’t regret this car wash speaker, gardening speaker, bath time speaker, kitchen speaker , it’s perfect for everything, even bbq in a large backyard!!My ONLY complaint, the “white” is anything but! But for the quality and portability it’s worth every penny!!!!

The sound was great but the speaker died after a little over a year.  These often get a glitch, I think it’s the software, that keeps them from charging.  If you run through some steps the speaker sometimes starts working again and but eventually it won’t.  Bose will offer you a new one for $75 if its out of warranty.  Don’t take their offer.  These speakers are garbage.

I have the previous version of this Speaker (the first Bose SoundLink Color) and my husband kept talking about how cool my speaker was, so finally one day I bought him this newer version and he loves it!  Heck, I love it and want it for my own!  The sound is amazing, and I love the fact that this newer model is much more waterproof than the one I have.  It's perfect for the beach, or for picnics, outdoor overall.  Also, the soft-touch silicone exterior is nicer than the plastic feel of mine.  If mine fails, I will buy one of these for sure.

Worked okay and sound was good for the first few times I used it. I’ve only had it out of the case and in use less than 10 times since I purchased it. Now it won’t power on or charge. This was a somewhat expensive speaker from a brand name company and I would have expected it to last much longer than it has. I am still working with it trying to get it to play but I am extremely frustrated at this point.

It has everything I need and the sound is fantastic. The highs and the bass are super. Charges in around 3 hours plays for around 8 hours and I can either use the Bluetooth or hook up my I pod (classic) and it plays great. The app needs help but I really don't need the app. I love it.
Bose is the boss!!!I got this on prime day sale for a good deal

the reason I gave it three stars and not five is because it doesn't work w a standard MTG app. I've tried everything I can get it to work with my music and it works with my phone and so forth but not with this meeting app and that's why I bought it.

Great sound for speaker size, even my hard to please husband was impressed! The Bluetooth connectivity was the easiest I have used so far, I would have to say it was truly trouble-free. The addition of the smart app adds a dimension missing in other Bluetooth speakers. I highly recommend this product.

I bought this item despite of some negative reviews only to find the sound quality was not crisp but rather dull and muddy in my opinion. It is very subjective when it comes to sound quality, so to some, this could be an enough sound enhancer to your mobile phone or PC. I gave this a try only for few days until I decided to return,  so I didn’t have a problem charging battery as oppose to some noted in their reviews but when it was fully charged, it only lasted for 6 hours total with lower volume not 8 hours as it was advertised.  Bluetooth connectivity was pretty responsive. The casing is nice and the teal color I chose is exactly like in the pictures.

Bose is the best. Hands down. There are a lot of small speakers out there, and they're good, I have a couple, but my Bose is quality through and through. You can't go wrong. You may pay a little for them, but they are reliable and give  the sound you want.

The speaker sounds amazing when it works. It worked fine for a few weeks, then it stopped turning on unless it was connected to power. However more often than not, when the battery is fully charged, the unit will not turn on unless it’s connected to power. I have to reconnect the device to power it back on, then I can unplug it and use it. The problem is getting it to turn on. I bought this because it’s supposed to be portable. It’s not.

Stopped working after 3 months!  Used it for a party (fully charged).  After a couple of hours the speaker stopped working!  Now it won't even turn on!  Even if I plug it in to recharge it, there are NO lights to let me know it's charging or that it is functioning.  I will never buy product from Amazon again!  Manufacturer never answered my questions or concerns!

This is a good speaker for the price. However about three months into using it, I began to have issues with turning it on without plugging it in to the charger. It only happened a few times so I didn't think much of it. I should have though because now about 75% of the time I cannot turn it on without plugging it in to a power source. Idk if I just got a faulty product/ if the battery just needs to be changed but I am quite sad.

I have BOSE speakers in my car and I love the sound. Thought I’d try this with my iPhone when outside, changing rooms or just on the go and needed my personal downloads to hear on my deck, at the pool etc. it’s everything I hoped for and more. I highly recommend, it is worth it’s weight in gold

I've been debating on whether or not to get a Bluetooth speaker for myself and decided to go ahead and find a good one. This Bose speaker is great for a $100 on sale. Fills up a small room very well. The speaker also has an audio jack if I ever want to use this as a portable desk speaker for my PC. Sound is a little too bass heavy and I kinda wish Bose made the sound signature flat instead. Would buy a second pair to try out surround sound paring.

A fantastic speaker!I had another one (different vendor) but left it permanently plugged in to the charger, found out the hard way they are not designed to work that way (neither are laptops or cellphones for that matter) when the battery failed.

Didn't even know that Bose had made a upgrade to this product. I bought one for my girl a few years ago and decided that I needed one of my own. This one has the same great sound quality, but the new non slip, water resistant outer is awesome!

I have the old Soundlink #1 version and thought it fantastic.  I use it at my workstation.  This newest version is even better in sound plus its waterproof and Bluetooth links up to other devises (hello Alexa and Siri!).  This is the best bang for your buck, literally.  I love the portability and convenience of this sound powerhouse.  Treat yourself to multiple units in varied colors.

My niece took my other black Bose back to Scotland. That's how impress she was with it. Took it outside (we have over an acre) by the pool and the sounds still so good and clear. That's why I had to purchase another same model Bose. Easy to connect with Bluetooth. Great as car speakers as well. So portable and light. Works well in operating rooms. Surround sound is sooo good. Can't say enough! This is my second one!

Love the color. My 3rd Bose I have owned. They take forever to charge and some sounds can be a bit muted - mostly though does produce crisp, full bodied sound for most songs. Some of my rap music and oldies can be a little muted. But, it can rock out!

love the sound .. only lately after just a few months .. sometimes it 'connects' (to my laptop) .. sometimes it won't!  why??  please help me with this.p.s.  just found out by calling product support it needed 'reset' .. now working fine. Good Sound!

Ok..for $100 bucks this speaker is legit! When it comes,  you'll have to give it some power, charges 5 minutes and can power on! Its a smaller waterproof speaker, but it sounds like a concert! Bass rivals a small car stereo...still great for 1 or 3 rooms

So far so good! I love this Bose speaker the music is clear and crisp. Good quality with rich audio evenly in all directions!!! I owned multiple Bose items and this Bluetooth  speaker is just awesome! I have the bright yellow color, great for outdoors :)

First off, love this product, this is my second. As I had my first stolen, I bought the second here on sale. This one I rate lower than my first bose. Battery life is awful. Hits medium level after 2 hours despite charging just before. It creepily turns on in the middle of the night, calling out to me. When connected to the phone, music quality is great. Voice, not so much. People can hear me, but I can't hear them as volume is extremely low and distorted, even when my settings at optimal levels. I'll use until it's death, but I foresee a funeral coming soon.

I bought it for my dancing, it is very loud and love how it connects with your phone and talks to you- also lights up and tells you how charged the battery is. Water resistant is a plus but I haven't gotten any water on it so that's another thought that comes up. But I am very happy with it. Bought the case to go along with it and keep it safe. Haven't tested battery life yet.
My soundlink brings all the Bose to the yard.... see what I did there? Love this Bose. Durable, great sound, and affordable!

Connection is easy. You set the speaker up with the app and then you never have to open the Bose app again. It remembers your phone. Sound quality is amazing and the bass is impressive for such a small speaker. Apparently you can link more than one at a time for a stereo or surround experience but I only got one on Prime day. Considering a second if another sale comes around.

This speaker is very good. The sound is full and clear (might not be true technical descriptions but I am a listener, not an audio geek). Easy to use and the Bluetooth connection is simple to set up with our iPads. I work down cellar and when it is playing in our living room, I get all the benefit of its terrific sound. My son heard it and said he wanted one. Good product for simple listeners like me.
Loud!! It’s so loud for such a little thing. I love it. Beautiful color, soft feel. But the sound is great! I can play rock, reggae, jazz, reggaeton, all sounds great!!

Gave this to my daughter for Christmas.  She absolutely loved it.  Uses it everywhere including when she takes a shower.  Great base sound good size and she even pairs it with her phone so when she gets calls it rings and she can use the speaker for conversations.  Go figure....  multi purpose  lol

Pretty disappointed with the upgraded version. My last one is still going strong after almost 3 years.  I purchased the new version because we wanted to listen to it by the pool. But After fully charging it and playing it for an hour or so, the speaker will intermittently just loose all power. One time it started buzzing with no way to stop it until I plugged it in to charge it again. I missed the deadline to return it. Lost all credibility for similar Bose products.

Love the speaker. Only oddity is that the included charger seems to have a connector that is a tiny bit smaller than a normal micro USB plug. Weird. It got sloppy so it doesn't connect right but that only meant that now a regular micro USB fits nicely. I have about a zillion of those cords and chargers so it's not a problem. It's actually a plus as the included charger was integrated with the cord and the ones I now use are not and can be used with any charger.

I would not recommend buying this speaker, if you let the battery die completely it is a hassle trying to get this thing back on. You have to hold the battery down for 12 seconds, remove power outlet, then remove finger, plug back in, and maybe it will come on. This is what I’ve read and what I tried a year ago with this Bose sound cloud speaker. It worked a year ago but it is not working today. This happens all the time make sure to read reviews before you purchase this speaker! Bose has No troubleshooting tips on the website for when this happens.

Very good sound and design. I just wish there was a button to turn off the announcing voice. When I put my baby to sleep and turning on his music, the speaker announcing very loud that it had connected to my phone. No need for that. Overall happy with the Boss quality.
Bought for in-law gift. He loves it.  I have the older version of this and this one does sound better definitely.

Today I received my Bose soundlink speaker and connected it. The quality of the sound is superb! I was able to enjoy the music while I clean the house today. This was the best birthday gift I could have received. Thank you, Preston!

I have had a JBL Flip 4 for 6 months and wondered if this Bose Bluetooth speaker would sound better. It connected VERY easily to my phone with no app needed. However, the sound left much to be desired.  Side by side comparison with the Flip 4 was no comparison at all.  Bose sounded muddy and not near as loud as the JBL at the same volume. I did not have the Bose unwrapped for 15 minutes before it was reboxed and being returned. Very surprising for a Bose product that cost 33% more than the Flip 4 ($100 vs $75).  Do yourself a favor.  Buy a JBL and skip this Bose.

The multi-device Bluetooth feature is complete crap. I hate it. No notification sounds come from your phone or the speaker when you have another device playing on the speaker. I'm constantly resetting the speaker and re-pairing it with my phone. Poor, poor design.

i just received my speakers and i was blown away from the sound it's fantastic and easy to carry around. I have connected to my laptop and phone. This will be my main speaker for my laptop now. For charging the speaker i usually plug it using my wall ac adapter and i have no issues with it. I would recommend this speaker.

It’s been turning off randomly and refusing to turn back on. Even though I know it’s fully charged. Sound quality is great but reliability is sub par, wouldn’t expect this from Bose but sadly I should have taken heed to the poor reviews. Save your money and buy another brand. Little birdy told me Bose is going under so it sadly makes sense

Ok this could've been such a great speaker but Bose dropped the ball. The most annoying thing is the connectivity. Sometimes it didn't want to connect regardless if you use the app or from the Bluetooth settings in your device. It is more difficult when trying to sync two speakers together. I have spent an hour trying to sync both of these together. Mostly I end up having to reset the stubborn things!

I love the way this speaker sounds and its great for travel. I take this outdoors with me everywhere. I love the color as well. Once paired to your phone you can control it from there. I would suggest getting a cover holder for easy carry.

This was bought as a gift for my husband, but I couldn't wait all summer to give it to him because I knew he'd want to use it outside all summer long.  I'm so glad I didn't wait!  It was the best speaker for range, sound, and portability this summer and the best Prime Day deal I took advantage of this year!

We’ve had this for about a month so far. So for the short term, it is a very nice speaker. The sound is very good for being small. Out of the box it had maybe a 50% charge and was super easy to connect to multiple phones. Haven’t had any of the glitches from other reviews, but then again its only been a short time. Like that it’s water resistant, although I wish it was water proof because the speaker gets used a lot by the hot tub. Also we really like the soft rubberized texture of the out side. Overall in all honestly it’s pricey for what it is, but that’s expected  from the name BOSE. I would say its around $30 more than the closest  name brand competition in size and sound.  In the end we are very pleased with the color sound link II and would recommend.

I have had this speaker on my Wishlist for over a year, so when I was planning my mother's graveside service, I knew this would be perfect.  And it was.  The day was clear and cool with just a light breeze.  The speaker was out of the way and the sound was so beautiful.  So glad that I purchased this speaker.

What do I need to really say about this Bose speaker? Bose is absolutely the best. The sound quality is great and I like that I can take it anywhere. When I travel it is always with me so I can listen to my favorite radio station, Pandora or my music on my iPhone wherever I am. I own two of them and also bought my daughters the smaller version. They love them.
Charging port is so crappy I can't get it to charge! Charging cable won't connect rendering an otherwise great speaker, worthless. Need to return.

This is a nice little BT speaker.  It's intuitive to use, sounds good, isn't too big, and rugged enough for my needs.  I originally bought the JBL Charge 3 and returned it because the sound quality didn't meet my needs.  Bottom line, The Charge 3 is a great speaker if you're looking for full waterproof, thumping base, aren't picky about sound quality, and want to be able to turn it up loud enough to fill a large indoor or outdoor space.  If you are interested in sound quality, want to hear all the instruments and vocals,  listen to a podcast, or fill the kitchen or bedroom with sound go with the Bose.

I also have the Bose soundlink mini which has a far superior sound than this one.  I was gravely disappointed with the quality of sound on this one.. jazz music is really flat sounding on this speaker, it drives me nuts.  I wish I would have returned it; But alas I have settled for barely tolerable sounds just to save a buck.

Was really nice for the three or so days that it actually worked.  It stopped taking a charge, and the usual recommended "fixes" did not work.  Very, very disappointed in Bose.  I thought Bose had higher quality standards than this.  I can see they've gone downhill.

I get lots of compliments on the sound of this speaker when I bring it to parties. It’s sounds great. But the sound is directional. I would like a 360 degree sound which I knew this doesn’t provide but this speaker fit in my budget more than the UE mega boom or the Bose 360 speakers. If you can spring for the more expensive 360 degree speakers. Go with them. If not. This Bose sounds much better then the JBL charge 4 and the UE boom 2.

This product will no longer take a charge left it plugged in for days and nothing.  Won't turn on more than a second.  Looking into reaching out to customer service,  and looking for warranty.  Such a bummer.  The older model I have has lasted YEARS!  excellent piece of equipment.  This one... Not so much.  Will change review based on experience with customer service.

Positives: The sound quality is amazing even at high volumes. It charges quickly and won't die like other bluetooth speakers when plugged in and playing music on low battery.Negatives: Sometime it does not pair or it starts to pair with multiple things and then starts saying "Now Connected To..." each thing back and forth.  The firmware updates also are super slow on the Bose connect app.  Battery seems to not last as long.
UPDATED REVIEW:I had a bum unit, and Bose replaced it no questions asked. The new one actually fixed some things that I thought were "features" and it ends up they were just broken.

In true Bose fashion these speakers are simply the best. Great sound. Plenty loud. They instantly paired with my iPhone. They are great to have outside. We leave them out of the sun on the built in bbq and you can totally hear while your in the pool. This is our second set just to have more round the house.Highly recommend

I hand this Bluetooth speaker for only a little over two weeks and it stopped working, it will not charge. When I plug it into to charge it flashes indicating that it is charging but switches off after less then 5 seconds.  I'm very disappointed in this product.  I had the previous version for about two years before it two stopped charging so I was forced to buy a new Bluetooth.  The sound is great and the battery life is far so I decided to buy the this new one. Only to be let down with pure disappointment. Time to start looking else where for Bluetooth section.

I bought a Bose because they are a top name in speakers and I wanted something quality. This is quality. Great sound, doesn't sound like crap when you crank it up, connects from at least 40 feet away on another story of my house, and is easy to work. Love it, and you will too. The problem with the Sonos speakers are that you need to download some app to use them properly. This just quickly hooks up to your phone and you're ready to roll.

I own an aquatic blue version for several years and I love it so much. I saw that these were on sale! I also love the color exclusive Midnight Blue. I've been waiting for another blue color. Overall great sound, battery life is alright if you have the music to the highest volume. Absolutely great for using party mode!! I'm really satisfied with my purchase.

I really liked this speaker until the battery completely died after 1 year, 8 months. It won't take a charge and the speaker won't work plugged into power when it has a dead battery. For this, I would not recommend. Rechargeable batteries ought to last at least five years., and even then they should be user serviceable.

Sounds great, but with the size of the room I need two speakers either in party or stereo mode. And, since, the second speaker stopped connecting to bluetooth, I'm in limbo for 3-4 weeks until Bose sends a replacement. Phone support was patient, but after 10-15 minutes with them, they determined what I already knew: no way was that second speaker going to make a connection. Hoping not to spend so much time swiping the little speaker icons on the iPad app when the replacement arrives. Not used to having to clean the screen quite so much.
Battery died after 18 months. Bose offered a replacement for $75. Said no since it's not a reliable product to me anymore. Wish I'd bought Amazon's warranty.
Very good speaker. Buy the dedicated charging cord for this speaker. If it is not getting enough power while charging, it will beep at you because of low voltage.

This definitely wasn’t what I expected from Bose. This item was cute, the right size, but had none of the base and sound one would expect from the company. Poor sound quality not worth the money they’re asking. I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone and most certainly wouldn’t pay the price. You could get a better sound from a standard sound bar✍🏾🤷🏽‍♀️

Small, powerful and great sound from a small unit. Rechargeable battery has good life unless you forget to switch it off when you have finished using it.  The Battery runs down pretty quickly under those circumstances. Highly recommended if you want a very small speaker with great sound. Works well with Amazon Dot.

I don't think I have ever purchased a product in which they do not give you a direct way to charge the product. Oh they give you a chord but you have to purchase a plug in to be able to use the chord they give you. I bought one about two years ago and really liked it so I purchased another one.  I was half tempted to ship the product back due to not having a $3 plug on a $140 product. Its like buying a car and not getting a battery with it. It just doesn't make any sense.

It has a great sound, especially for such a small speaker.  It is packable and sturdy.  The bluetooth is easy to sync.  I'm not sure how far it reaches though, I've never had my phone too far away.  The battery life is likely normal length but I've not had it long enough to see if it wears down with time.

this is my 2nd Bose Sound link speaker.  I think the first one lasted a few years before the battery would no longer accept or hold a charge. The sound just fills the room!!I would like to see BOSE add an option for the time when the battery no longer holds a charge, to work off 110volts, so the speaker can still be used at home.

Bought this for my mother to use in her retirement home.  She loves it since it is easy to use.  She said she now has music in her life again.  She finds old tunes on the internet or youtube and sings to them.  This speaker doesn't dissapoint.

After receiving the speaker I download the Bose app and it wanted me to update after the update the speaker died and is completely unresponsive to any buttons or the charger and no lights light up the app said that the update was complete and gave no message of a failed update so now I have a paperweight that I haven't even heard how it sounds yet

A lot of bang for your buck. I’ve never been disappointed by Bose. One minor flaw, this speaker and the one I purchased before had a is shorter than desirable battery life. Overall an awesome product.

I'm had been buying Bose products for their quality, but this product lasted one year. I called Bose, and they wanted me to pay 75 dollars for repair. They mentioned that I was two months out of their warranty and they will cover the repair. They couldn't tell me what the problem was with the speaker, but they wanted me to pay for the repair.I'm very disappointed with Bose's products, and it is time to give a chance to new competitors that will stand behind their products and care for the client

Bose never disappoints when your looking for sound quality.  Had recommendations about this speaker and no hesitation ordering.  Speedy delivery and simple start up & use instructions.  Would not hesitate to order again.Thanks Amazon.

I love this speaker. It is the perfect portable speaker. I've had it over 2 years now and use it daily. It has great battery life for when on the go and great sound quality when you want to jam out. The size is really great too for portability because it's not too large where it gets heavy to bring everywhere. Highly recommended.

Bought this on sale for $80 on Prime day sale. I would have bought 2 if I had known they could be used in pairs. Will by another if they go on sale again. Sound and volume very good. Hard rubber case offers great protection against bumps and drops.

This speaker really packs a punch!  Awesome bass for such a compact speaker. Bose makes the best products and this one doesn’t disappoint. If I have to say one thing that needs improvement, it is that the “voice” is awful and very difficult to understand. With today’s technology, Bose should easily upgrade this feature.

Very good sound quality for such a small package. I ran the gamut with JBL but had bluetooth connectivity issues. I prefer the Bose because of sound quality, compact size, light weight and ease of portability. No bluetooth issues. Very happy with my purchase.

Great sound for its relatively compact size.I now have 3 of them for coverage around the house. Blue tooth is far more stable compared to wi-fi at our household. This switch returned music as a source of enjoyment for me rather than a daily source of frustration trying to get Sonos and Wi-fi to cooperate.

Just wanted to review the Bose Speaker and to say we are very happy with it. We take it everywhere. At the lake, beach, backyard, inside, it goes everywhere. Great sound from a small size. The wife was really impressed.Very long life battery.

This product has trouble charging.  I’ve already had to factory reset and it wouldn’t charge except directly into the wall with a specific plug.  The instructions if you want to call them that are completely unhelpful and the charge sure doesn’t last for 8 hours.  A few hours yes but not close to eight

I LOVE this speaker, if you are looking for a Bluetooth speaker with clear sound and easy bluetooth linking capabilities, look not further! The acoustics are very nice, the buttons inlayed which make it a perfect non bulky speaker to travel with. You can also Bluetooth link to an additional speaker if you buy two. The individual speaker gets pretty loud on its own, I was very impressed!
I am so proud to display, share and enjoy the true sounds of real music on this outstanding system from "Bose".You will not be disappointed but, totally amazed of the quality of sound it produces.

I am not a whiz at this but so far it works well. I will have to get someone to help me to further my knowledge. I bought 2 to use them. But if I can’t then I will connect it with my Bose radio. I bought them for my prime music. Was told that you can’t use 2, like one in each room.

Loved it so much I got a second one so that I can do party mode and stereo mode. What I don't like is having to use the Bose Connect+ app to do both those modes. Further, the app requires location information for bluetooth which seems unnecessary.

Great speaker! I needed something small and portable that also packed good sound quality. I work in a louder environment. This speaker really fits the bill. I have owned this for almost a year now and use it almost daily. Durable, quality sound, portable. The only draw back is that the battery only last for at most 2-3 hours.

Perfect size and shape.  The full and crisp sound make this product an excellent choice.  An unexpected bonus is the ability to use the Soundlink as a guitar amplifier by using a 1/4-3.5 link to simply plug in an electric guitar for a quality sound!  The deep blue color was a concern (over black) initially, however now I wouldn't want any other color.  Great product with no hesitation when engaging to a sound source.

This thing is AWESOME! Great sound where ever you go. I use it outside, in my office, in my bathroom... It was super easy to setup and the sound can't be beat. If you download the Bose App, you can name your device. Mine is called Beat Slayer. No complaints..

Love the deep, rich sound it has.  It was very easy to set up!My only negative point is that the manual that came with it suggested I buy 2 and have it in stereo!  Sounds great, right?  Well only one speaker can sync to my phone at a time!  Anyone want to buy one from me???
I've only had this for less than 2 months and it's not working. Thoughts?? What can I do?? This was expensive!!!

Unfortunately, the return window is only one month for this product which is over-priced to begin with seeing as it doesn't work 3 months after purchase. Volume is permanently low, battery does not hold a charge. Piece of crap really for $129 and no recourse to return or replace this BOSE speaker. I have not had problems with previous Bose speakers so this is very disappointing.

Wanted a little better sound than speakers on the phone. This fits he bill  nicely and is easy to connect and use. One slight downside are the symbols for the  for the controls. The are small and faint to see.

I tried it.  But went with the Sony XB-32.  Sounds better, cost less, longer battery life.I thought it had an effective way to “choose” bluetooth sources, but I was wrong.  It DOES tell you which one you are connected to though.

I love this speaker, I take it EVERYWHERE it’s perfect size and the holding case is wonderful. I wasn’t sure cause I didn’t wanta spend so much money wise, but I very happy I did. The sound is great I have a 3,000 square foot home and I can be in the back half of home and still hear it while it is in dinning room which are on opposite ends of the house..

Purchased this during Prime Day and I am glad that I did. This speaker puts off a great quality sound to carry around the house or even outside. I haven't had it that long, so time will tell with longevity, but as of now the battery has good life and the speaker provides great loud sound!

I never write reviews but Im so mad! Dont buy this! Its a waste of money, just check other reviews here and in bose website, it work well for a day then stop working completely, I thought I was just unlucky, so I ask for a replacement and it happen the same thing it doesnt work! This product its defective amazon should stop selling this item, the worst part its that I live outside the US so I pay a lot of money for the shipping for this piece of junk!

Easy connectivity with apple products.  Literally took like 1 minute.  We have other Bose systems throughout our house and in both cars.  This was for the garage.  It’s worth the money paid, but you get what you pay for.  It’s a small speaker with great technology behind it, but it is what it is.

What beautiful sound, I'm amazed they created something so small with such pure sound. The bluetooth connection took just seconds and the responsiveness to my iPhone is excellent. I'll be puchasing more for my gifts.

Ordered this speaker in Februray 2020 and it no longer charges. The battery stays at 10% when it's initially plugged in to be charged (for a second or so) then it completely shuts off. I'm very disappointed since I've only used the speaker a few times since it arrived. I expected a better product from Bose and it wasn't a cheap purchase/speaker either :(

I ordered this to use in the garden for parties, but I am extra happy because I needed a way to attach speakers to my MacBook Pro because the built-in speakers are blown, but I wanted something that could be controlled from the keyboard and that was a surprise bonus for this Bose.

Maybe I was expecting too much from this speaker but I was surprised to find the sound quality is no better, and possibly a little worse than my JBL flip of the same size. It seems like a very well-made product but not what I was hoping for in terms of sound quality.

Provides wonderful sound to a 16' x 20' room with 4-5 people in it (this is our need).  I can imagine this would also be great to have out on a picnic, canoe, or other outing.  It's small, light and great!!!

I used to have the original model of the Soundlink Color, which was fantastic. Unfortunately it didn't hold up to being run through a full cycle in the washing machine (I don't hold that against it). This new version, the Color II, is terrible.It seems like it has a worse sound stage than the original did.

Fits my needs for a portable speaker that I listen to music in my bedroom and on my deck.  I am not audiophile so my critique is limited to it sounds great; I enjoying listening to my smooth jazz playlists from my iPhone.
I was really looking for a good Bose speaker. This one is nice and looks good. But does not have the best sound quality. l am keeping it though. But l did expect much better quality from Bose.

Love, live, live the product.  Kept losing connection to the point I had to reset to factory settings, then reset the wifi.  Could only do twice.Went to Best buy to get aux cable.  Was told my phone is too old for speaker.  My phone is 1.5 yrs old.  REALLY!

For Christmas around 8 months ago, I bought my mother one of these and an Echo Dot. She loves it, and uses it every day. And I have recommended the same combination to quite a few people since it worked out so well for me. But, yesterday for no apparent reason the Bose completely stopped working, or responding at all.I was a big fan of this product. But if it won't even last a year it's definitely not worth the money.

The speaker sounds great and the size and portability is just what I needed. Unfortunately it stopped charging after 6 months with very limited use. Wish I'd read the reviews on this product before purchasing because this seems to be a common issue.

I have had this speaker for a year not and I have had so many problems. If the speaker dies you have to reset and play around just to get it working again. And now it just wont charge at all anymore. Complete disappointment.

I purchased so I could hear the tv better in my recliner and not have the tv volume rattle the windows.  The sound is not very good connected to a mobile phone on a call .  I had to purchase a transmitter for the tv to connect bluetooth. connected to the TV It works really well. The Bose quality is heard. I was going to return it after the poor quality connection on the Iphone 6. I think It might work better on a newer phone.

I'm really enjoying my speaker.  It does a great job and picks up father than my previous bluetooth speaker did.  Very good sound quality and good EQ. I love how the bose app let's me control the speaker from multiple devices at once.  Very cool feature.

Great for the beach and outdoor activities. Easy to use and connect. Great sound. I love it. Battery lasts several hours, the larger more costly Bose has the better battery life. For my use it’s just fine.

Great little speaker, I had to replace my 2016 Soundlink that got dropped in a bucket of water (that still played underwater and then never played again) .Bose is the only portable speaker I’ve been satisfied with. We also have the larger, older Bose that is not Bluetooth, bit has great sound!

This was pretty easy to set up.  I gave it 4 stars because it doesnt switch between devices very well.  And it drains my ipad battery super fast. In a matter of a few hours I-went from 100% to zero.  This did have good sound and clarity.  Dont think the battery drain is worth it.  Rather disappointing.

Got this for my backyard. Easy to connect and great sound coming from a small device. Battery life seems to last a good amount of time. It's a Bose product so I don't expect any issues. I have had good luck with Bose throughout the years.

I purchased product in 2018 for Christmas and it stopped working about 2 months later. Could not return because it passed the return date. Also warranty had expired and was asked to repurchase a new speaker. We watched youtube videos to see if we could reboot the system and even were able to give it an update. Still no luck in having it work. would not turn on/charge. lights would just blink a few times and would turn off again. I thought Bose was top of the line but this product is not good. think again before purchasing.
We had one just like this and loved it. We take it everywhere we go outdoors. This one was a replacement and we had to get another one as soon as that one stopped working a couple years later.

This little speaker is a game changer! I love that I can move it from room to room. Of course it sounds amazing! loud enough to hear it from another room that isn't close together. It's water proof so it comes in the bathroom with me when I take a shower. I am obbessed.
It is light & compact. Connects easily to my phone or iPad. I thought it would have a better volume range. Battery life is good. Says it holds for 8 hours but actually only holds for 4 -5 hours top!

I just got 2 of these. I had them plugged in, paired, downloaded the Bose Connect app, set to party mode, and beautiful music coming out all in less than 5 minutes. Wicked easy. Keep in mind, you will need a plug for the USB cable, it is not included. That is stupid.

This is my first review on Amazon in many years.  Bose sound quality and portability were great BUT the speaker stopped working for me after about 1 year, similar to other users.  It simply would not charge any more, even after trying another charger.  I would use the product a few times a week for an hour or two, at most.  I love the Bose sound quality but I don't feel I can trust this product will work past a year and I don't have time to deal with customer service to get it working again...Bose needs to address this issue.
Purchased this is November 2017,  It stopped holding a charge after 18 months. Now it does even turn on when plugged direct into power.Not what I would expect from a Bose product, very disappointing.

This speaker is remarkable for its great tone quality, bass response, and clarity.  Bluetooth connectivity is excellent, and  I am very happy that I can also use my stereo cable to make a direct connection to the auxiliary port. I am very satisfied with this speaker.
Absolutely love the sound quality!

I realize now that Bose is a leader in their market and I can see why this is true. The sound on this device is wonderful. I have tried several different speakers, but this has been the best so far. Love it!

I bought two of these. They both stopped tKing a charge within 6 months. Did a lot of troubleshooting as a lot of people have this problem with them. Still don't work ☹  o went with the bose for the quality 👎

What can I say? It’s BOSE! Excellent quality sound, I just love it so much. The material on top is soft rubber, very easy to clean. And it looks really cool. So easy to transport and carry everywhere you go.

Horrible quality of sound. Super low volume, worse than the internal TV speaker. Followed the numerous on line articles on troubleshooting. This is obviously a known issue. Wish I hadn’t thrown away the box.

Bose use to be the top dog. The connectivity is rediculously hard to set up with more than 2 speakers. You also need multiple adapters. They are crystal clear but not much volume to them. In my opinion Bose is loosing ground and the name isnt what it use to be.

Great speaker!! You have to put the speaker next to the wall so the sound can bounce off good!! My Dad told me yesterday and I did that you guys!! It sounds great! At first I was upset when I got it and the sound quality wasn’t so great until I did what he said and it sounds amazing now!! This particular speaker is made for carrying around outside and around your house etc. so it must be put next to a wall to carry off good sound. Hope this helps everyone out that wasn’t aware.

We loved it for 9 months. The sound was fantastic, it was SO easy to use. And then it just stopped working! Apparently there is only a 6 month warranty. So convenient! I'm shocked that a company known for its quality can't guarantee that it's product will last longer than 6 months. Considering that we only used it around the house, and never even had it around water, I am extremely disappointed.

The product was great until it just stopped working one day. I’ve attempted all of Bose troubleshooting and nothing is working. I’ve had the product less than 2 years and it hasn’t left my kitchen, using every few days. Very disappointed I have several other Bose products and haven’t had this issue.

We love to play music at dinner time and this little speaker really delivers!  The sound quality is superb and it connects easily to my IPad.  Also its range is excellent - I have carried it more than one room away from the IPad and it continues to play flawlessly.  If you are some kind of self- styled audio expert I guess you could find fault with it - but for mere mortals it is nothing less than amazing!
I like the speaker, only take away is that it constantly has an annoying beeper while on the charger.
I have a older Bose and it has better quality sound but I do like the rubber outer shell compared to the hard plastic.It did not come with a plug inbto charge it.

I'm very pleased with the speaker, the sound range is incredible, very life like all most like being in the recording studio, however the battery life is very short, keeping it plugged to a wall is preferable.
Are use the speaker in my music lessons. I absolutely love this thing!

Great speaker. Good quality sound. My only gripe would be that only one device can connect thru Bluetooth at one time. Another words, If I have my iPhone connected, and I want to use my iPad, I first have to "disconnect" the iPhone, then connect or "discover" the iPad. Kind of a pain.

this is a fantastic product. wish it was a big cheaper but you get what you pay for. and we love it. great sound quality, easy and compact. good distance for bluetooth. cannot think of anything that i would change about this speaker. fantastic. i always wanted a bose! love it.

For the model level, it's quite the performer indeed. Yes it's a step down from the BOSE Soundlink Mini II but only by a wee..I got frustrated with working the volume on the speaker itself but after troubleshooting in my Mac, the volume is now as how I want it. It's versatile and durable as it appears. Cheers!

This speaker is absolutely the best portable Bluetooth speaker that I have owned. It is Bose, so I wasn't expecting anything less. Some reviews claim that it lacks bass, but the thing is 5" x 5" x 2" thick, so yes it does lack a little bass. However, it has the best sound and bass out of all of my Bluetooth portable speakers (5). I chose white so that it wouldn't get as hot in the sun.  BUY IT, YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!!  :)

My wife and I are delighted with this speaker, and have commented that it's one of our best purchases ever. It produces an amazing sound, much more than you would expect from something this size. The speaker looks great, it's just the right size, and we like its rubbery feel for easy pickup and placing in different locations. I have only one little gripe. Every time I open the phone app, it struggles to find the speaker, even though the speaker is turned on and delivering music. But it eventually connects.
Decent sound quality, but nonvery loud. I expected better from Bose. My JBL speaker is far louder and has better bass. I’ll go back to JBL for my next speaker purchase.

Love the sound quality. It is expensive, but after doing hours of comparison and review reading, i am so happy i went with Bose. The midnight blue color also matches my living room decor, coincidentally, perfectly.
AMAZING + AMAZING + AMAZING.  And this is from a Sonos-filled household!

Today while listening to music in the garden the speaker chimed, "Battery Fried". At first we thought it said battery dead which seemed unusual since it had been off the charger for less than an hour, but after plugging it in and turning it on we received the battery fried message and the power light was blinking yellow. The reason for 1 star? We've had this speaker less than 4 days and have listened to it less than 10 hours. Has the Bose quality disappeared like so many any other products that used to produce quality items that are now crap with the name recognition?

I love this speaker the battery last a while and it always connects easily to my phone. I ordered one and it died a couple days after I got it so I exchanged it without any problems and ordered another one as a gift for my mom. It's light weight and super loud I rarely use it at full blast (and I love loud music) I can use it next to the shower or while I wash dishes or by the pool and don't have to worry if it gets splashed. Very well constructed I recommend stop looking just buy this one! Can't go wrong.

This is my second speaker of this type. My other one is black. I bought the same one in white for my bathroom. It sounds wonderful. The level of bass is much better than other speakers I have owned. That's why I bought a second one.
Great sound Second time buying this. I use this one in my home office.

The sound is impecable but the battery never charged above low power. Had to return the first unit, the second unit was the same. Later bought one from another vendor and it seems that they have battery power issues. If you want to use it with only electric power it will work fine. However do not count on battery power
Keeps losing connectivity through Bluetooth

ensure you download Bose connect app and complete  all updates on device, i paired my phone successfully, went to play Pink Floyd and there was no volume, complete updates and now I'm rocking and a rolling

I do not write many reviews however, the good -- I personally like the bose sound it is very pleasant background music. no highs no lows bose, however I like.  however I have purchased 2 that have died almost to the day under 2 years.  -- from what I understand a problem with the power board, overcharges or some hardware fault -- stuff has to last more than 2 years come on.! im done  will purchase anything else other than bose lots of BT speakers for sale.

The sound quality is phenomenal and it's compact. That said, it will no longer charge. I've swapped out 3 different micro USB chargers and you have to hold it in a certain way to keep it charging.I only had this for less than 7 months and used it sparingly.

This is my second Bose Soundlink speaker. I bought one for the upstairs and one for the downstairs. I am impressed with the sound quality coming from a small speaker and it easily linked to my two iPads and my iPhone. I can now listen to my favorite radio stations through the Internet with no distortion as well as Pandora and other streaming services. I live in a hilly area so radio stations are sketchy over the air. Since the Bluetooth range is 30 feet I can leave my iPad in the dinning room and take the music with me out to the patio, to the garage, or even to the bathroom while showing with no problem. Very satisfied

This little speaker packs a powerful punch! I took it camping and listened to Radio.com on it the first weekend I had it! Everyone raves about the sound quality! I like it so much, I ordered one for my son for Christmas.

A friend had one and I liked enough that I decided to get one too. Good sound. You can really raise the sound level with distorting the sound. I also liked being able to get it in more than just black. Even though it was pretty simple to set up I feel that a few more directions would be helpful for the person setting one up for the first time as a blue tooth.

This is my second Bluetooth Bose. I had the first series. Love it. After discovering this series is water resistant, I had to get it. Then I found out if you buy a second you can pair them as left and right stereotype speakers! So I did. It’s on it’s way! Only down side is the delivery person can’t read instructions: PLEASE LEAVE INSIDE ENCLOSED PORCH! Oh well.
These Bose sound great everywhere.  I purchased this for my wife and she loves it.  Blue is her favorite color so it worked out well.

Loved this speaker when I first bought it. But after about a year I received an update and I haven't been able to link my speakers. I've tried everything bose suggested and still nothing. Buy JBL forget you bose.

I ignored some of the bad reviews and forged forward with purchasing this. Big mistake. After five months of using for about 30 mins a day, max, it up and quit working all together. Past return window.

Terrible product. After one use it would not charge or turn on. Attempted to contact Bose and they were of no help.  I have other nose products and have been very satisfied but this speaker is garbage. Don’t waste you’re money on this trash.

We have a couple of these for the bathrooms.  They provide plenty of clean sound without having to worry about the humidity while taking a shower.  We get several hours of good sounding music and the recharge time is very reasonable. The speaker links up to our phones with no issues.  Worth the money for sure!
I have bought 3 of these as gifts, now, as well as one for my husband.  He loves it as do the other 3 people we gave one too.Great sound for a small bluetooth speaker.

Awesome sound. Hooks up to your phone quickly. Good battery life. Tested EDM, rap, pop and acoustic: slightly misses the larger bass sounds, but that is expected from a small speaker. Surprisingly held well though when we played them still, and didn’t rattle.this thing is also lightweight, so that’s great. :)

It was a little challenging to get set up, but that could have been my own issue.  The sound is exactly what I expect from Bose.  Big and clear.  This didn't come with a manual and clear instructions.  I had to go on line and download a full manual just to do the basic things.  That's why I think it was just me.  I'm sure a more savvy person would have been able to just take it out of the box and go!  Also, this is actually a bright orange color and not quite red.  I love the orange, but it was expecting red.  Just letting folks know!  All is well now.
I went with JBL flip 4 instead.
