With YouTube it works beautifully. Unfortunately with Zoom Meetings it is VERY quiet at its maximum setting, even with PC sound maxed out too. Quality of sound very good.

I really am pleased with this product. I got it quickly and the sound quality is very good. I'm sure the portability is going to be great also. That's why I I purchased it it also. Thank you for the nice price too.

I like the fact it connects to my Smart Phone.  I have two of these Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker IIs.  Using my phone app I am able to listen in stereo.  I have not had any problems with these speakers.  I use them when I am working outdoors or in the garage.  Two thumbs up!

I got the bose color sound link about a year and a half ago and it stopped charging.  Eventually I decided to try again with the bose soundlink 2.  I got it end of January and now it is beginning of April and now this one WILL NOT CHARGE.  I have used the original bose cable and I've also tried others.  Bose is supposed to be quality.  I urge you to rethink this purchase if you want one!

It says battery is high then suddenly dies . Even if it is plugged in . So i can only listen to about 5 songs before it dies and when i try to listen to music while its plugged in, it doesnt charge and it still manages to die.

The speaker itself is great, I love the sound quality, however, the color in the picture and the one in person is so different, I feel played. I got the coral-red one, and as the name suggests, one would expect it to be red. What I got was a bright orange speaker. I didn't have time to exchange it, so I'm now stuck with an orange speaker :'(

This thing just turns off when I get a phone call, (and I am all for silencing when the phone rings,) but then it won't turn back on again, and I have tried the 3 dot reset I found online, and it still won't work. I am so dissatisfied! Do NOT buy this piece of junk!!!

Was very excited about this speaker after our first few times listening to music on it. But after several months, it no longer connects or charges. It only says "battery level medium" even if its battery is fully charged or empty. More importantly, it is unable to connect on bluetooth to anyone's phone, whether it's an Android or iPhone. Felt like we just wasted $130 for nothing.
Great quality sound out of such a small speaker.  I use in my office and the sound quality is excellent.  I like the size of the speaker and the multiple colors.
AWESOME gift for husband's birthday!!. He loves it.  Get the case with it for portability.  My husband takes it to work every day.  Great sounding speaker.

Na, you don't need two speaker stereo with the sound out of this thing.  It fills the room. It's wonderful sound, music and a pleasure to have an own. Works anywhere there is bluetooth, office, RV, beach, boat, pool side, In Your Car, ISS? :-)
Over all ok but tiny black on black buttons cannot be read even in the sun. Need to add white to all buttons and label to make sense.Sounds fine for the size.
The speaker wont turn on sometimes unless  the battery is fully charged. It also doesnt seem to charge everytime you plug it in. For being a Bose product in very disappoonted

When it's loud enough to rock it just doesn't soind that good. When you get over it and realize it's just a small, portable speaker it's time to charge the battery. It gives me about 3 ½ hours of life ising bluetooth at 80% volume. Pretty disappointing.
👍🏼Easy to connect to my iPhone, good sound quality, light weight👎🏼color isn’t really white - it’s more like light gray. A bit bigger than expected

I have had my Bose sound link for over a year and love the convenience of it. I move it from room to room when performing housework. If you are an audio book listener, there is no control of the bass which causes voice to sound more muffled and less clear. It would be nice to have bass control.  To compensate for the lack of voice clarity I have to increase the volume. That is why I give it 4 stars. Quality and construction are excellent.

While the device is great, within 6 months the battery life had significantly reduced. It's like it won't stay charged, and sometimes takes way too long to charge, and when it is fully charged, it runs down pretty quick within a few hours compared to the 8 hour life it came with
So loud Bose speaker. I really love the light indicator tells you weather ints connected or not with waterproof nothing more fun than enjoying it everywhere.

This is a good little speaker.  I would definitely say it's worth the price I paid for it.  It's Bose so it has the sound quality I expect.  Obviously, I wouldn't expect it to outperform a more expensive Bose speaker.I especially noticed the superior sound quality when I placed it next to the inferior speaker I was replacing with it.

I dont know why others leave low feedback on this Product.I was very impressed with the sound and also to make phone calls and receive. People can hear me loud and clear.As usual Bose did a great job!

Love it! Which I very seldom say. The sound quality is what made the difference to me. I bought a few of the cheaper ones but this is worth the extra $. I will buy another soon so I can pair them together.
Nice looking speaker with an amazing sound, but NOT TOO HAPPY, because it came with just the cable and not the plug. I can’t use it yet because I have to buy a plug. NOT GOOD!
The first Bose product I bought was an ear hands free device ! The best I ever had. This speaker is great! I have several speaker from Bose. This one is a much improved as the mini.

The ad says  "enjoy 8 hours of play time" ive had mine for a full week and it wont play for longer than 2 hours. also ass the battery starts to die the volume also starts to get worse. will be contacting amazon to get a refund or replace with a new unit.

i was really looking forward to this speaker, but in the months that i have had it it has been a disappointment. It wont turn off on its own, sobthe batteries run down.  Battery life is surprisingly minimal, 4 hours of play time, perhaps. Sound quality is also disappointing. A friend has the next model up and the sound is noticeably superior. Would not buy again.

I bought this as a gift for my husband.  Previously he was carrying an gnome speaker around to listen to his books and it finally died.  I decided to get him something smaller, easier to hold and better sound quality.  He was over the moon with this gift and uses it every single day.  This is the 3rd one I have bought and gifted.

This small Bluetooth speaker packs a lot of sound. Bose is the premier maker of audio equipment. Well worth the money. This is the 2nd one I've purchased. Can't go wrong. The quality of the sound is amazing.
Worked great until it suddenly stopped charging!

Great sound, easy to use. Recognizes your phone quickly once programmed. bass adjustment is done acoustically by  using a wall  ( corner or flat area) for bass response. Home improvements, yard work, office, or beach this things is going with me. I will buy another to sync them for even more amazing sound. The Bose app is a plus as well.

I love my original Bose stereo but I wanted something I could easily take outside around the pool and connect via bluetooth to play music. This works perfect. It was so easy to connect and the sound quality is all Bose. The best.Love it
I love this little speaker! Great sound for something it's size! Bass is clear and present! I only wish there was a feature to secure it to the dashboard while I drive my work truck.

This unit stop working in less than a year.  It actually does not recharge the battery anymore.  I am trying to get a new one through warranty but have not been able to get any help from BOSE so far.  The Amazon Bluetooth unit I bought for 1 third of the price of this Bose unit works incredibly well.  Don't waste your money on this one...

Everything really good! I expected a better quality on the sound since bose has done an amazin job with speakers in the past. Maybe it’s because of the price and maybe me getting used to expensive ones but it’s decent I guess.Once I stop using my phone Bluetooth I turn it off, but the speaker will never stop saying “ready to connect” until you do something, quite is pretty annoying. This can easily be fixed with a firmware update.

I really wish there was an equalizer on this thing, the sound is way off. I am contemplating returning it, but I also got it at a good price and it is a Bose. But the Sony that I purchased on Prime Day for the half the cost (and weight) is just as good if not better.

While the speaker quality is EXCELLENT and the unit has been durable, this speaker has a mind of its own. It comes on randomly, then won't turn on when I need it to. Won't connect with Bluetooth devices without a long, drawn-out effort ending in so much frustration that I often give up.

Love this speaker so much that I bought a second one. But this time it can only be charged via computer. I preferred having the ability to plug it into a normal outlet. Either way, it’s a great value.
Bought this for my husband as a father's day gift. He absolutely loves it (opened it early). Only complaint is that is does not come with an outlet plug, just a power cord.

Sound quality, especially the bass, is lower than original SoundLink Color.  I have the original and compared the two, my old SoundLink Color sounds much better than the SoundLink Color II.  It’s OK quality for the price of $99, but I want a good second portable Bluetooth speaker so I returned the SoundLink Color II and will try a different one.

The sound is great! It gets pretty loud and has good bass. The connection stays great when you’re in another room. It auto connects to your phone when it’s turned on, making playing music instantly. Easy to control from your phone as well. Only downside to this device is it doesn’t seem to charge with any other cord other than the one it came with. I’ve tried many different charging cords since I lost my Bose one, none work. Not sure if the charging port broke or what’s going on with it.

This thing is LOUD. I place it in the middle of the road for photoshoots where there are no cars visible and we heard the music loud and clear. This speaker has a rubber texture on it where gripping it is easy so it won't slip from your hands or any surface. I bought a JBL Pulse 2 for about $50 more and in my opinion, ​this Bose speaker sounds much better.

After using up the first charge, this speaker will no longer charge. I am not the only purchaser with this issue. Check the internet for others with the same problem. After downloading the latest update, still not able to charge. :-(

It’s an OK speaker. Nothing wrong with it, there is just minimal base and really sounds canned at any volume. You get what you pay for though. This will be an amazing speaker to have in the golf cart. Highly recommend for a golf cart speaker. Other than that, it’s not the best speaker to bring room to room or outside. My last speaker was a Soundlink III and I didn’t want to buy a revolve as I feel comfortable with the box design.

I bought this originally as a Christmas gift.  The product wouldn’t charge.  I initiated a return and ordered a replacement.  I got a second speaker shipped to me very quickly and this one had the same issue as well...wouldn’t charge or stay on.  Terribly disappointed.  I returned the speaker over two weeks ago and it says my return was received and I am yet to receive my money back.  I will definitely not order again.

We had fine, inexpensive blue tooth speakers.  Saw this on Prime day at an amazing price and ordered it.  It's like night and day comparatively.  It's almost as good as my stereo speakers!  Looking to buy another soon!
Beware:  THE POLAR WHITE COLOR THAT I ORDERED IS ACTUALLY LIGHT BLUE.
It would be good if it wasn't so expensive. Its not loud at all.
I am a musician and have seen the evolution of speakers since back in the 70's.  This unit works well for the price.  I would have purchased a more expensive unit but I am not one of the 1%...hahaha

I bought this product for myself to use around the house and while I'm at work. My boyfriend owns the Color Soundlink I that we used quite a bit and so we are familiar with Bose products. The first speaker I bought worked wonderfully for about a few hours until the speaker died. When I plugged it in, it would not turn on to charge or light up in any way. Luckily, I was within the parameters of time to return the product to Amazon and request a new one be shipped. I received my second speaker a couple weeks later and used it for a little less than a month with no issues. I was able to use it until it died and charge it again. Less than a month after receiving my new one I ran into the same issue. It was not able to turn on even when plugged in and was not telling me if the speaker was charging. This was shocking since this was my second speaker from them and the same defect happened once again. Luckily, through Bose support I was able to reset my speaker and turn it on again but not after going through the trouble of waiting through being on hold for several minutes. I am honestly disappointed in the manufacturer quality of this product if this is an issue that needs to be fixed and have not publicly posted. There's no saying when I will have to reset my speaker again and go through the tedious process. I am upset because I am usually a large supporter of Bose products, but this is not their best.

Covid-19 has kept me at home and communicating with family and friends via my MacBook Pro.  The built in speaker kept distorting the sound.  I purchased the Bose sound link to help remediate the problem and it works perfectly.
I purchased this because of the Bose name. I also own a JBL speaker and truthfully, they are equivalent in sound. Sure it weatherproof but that wasn’t my reason for the purchase.

What I like is fast connecting  and a quality sound. Sound level is good Also. Great for outside usage on my deck. Seems to be a durable speaker.Great choice if you just want a small speaker for light listening.

Initially I absolutely loved the sound quality.  It hasn’t been 4 months and this speaker does not properly pair nor is the sound quality superior.  I purchased this speaker to replace my JBL speaker.  I am so disappointed.  I trusted Bose as I have several Bose products, including a headset (for travel) and subwoofers in my home. This is so unacceptable.  I need a replacement. Immediately!!!!!!

Ordered these as a gift for my parents and they absolutely love this speaker.  It was easy enough for them to get hooked up to their phones and the sound quality is great.  It is also water resistant which is a great plus if you are on the go.  My next portable speaker will probably be a Bose.
Bought this for my husband for christmas last year. He absolutely loves it, takes it with him everywhere. Great sound, no issues with connectivity and going strong after a year of everyday use.
Would give this a 5 but for $129.00 Bose should at least give you a plug not just the cord!There customer service wasythe greatest not friendly at all!
Great battery and great connectivity.  I love this speaker and I own lots of speakers.

I can hear this speaker from anywhere in the boat or I can place it anywhere on the boat.  The clarity is astounding.  I used it for both my music and a speaker for my television.  It's like being in a theater. Off the boat, put it in the case - it goes with me.
I really like the compact feature and it has wonderful sounds. The Bose Connect software was a quick download and I was rocking out in minutes! Great product.
I love my Bose speaker! However I am a little upset that it did NOT come with a wall adaptor.  I have to purchase that as I am not always on my computer and I need an adaptor for the wall.

I borrowed one of these before buying this one. I am so impressed I cannot tell you. I shared it once and have been playing music for 3 months on and off. Love how tiny it is to move it around and the sound is exceptional. Very happy with my Bose purchase.

This speaker came in literally less than 24 hours, I was shocked. I love Bose products - you can have multiple people connected to the BT at the same time which is helpful. The battery lasts a very long time and even if you have it sitting directly in the sun, it doesn't overheat.
I wish we could change the bass levels because it’s really loud, and if you turn it up to hear the vocals and other instruments more you just get even more bass.... I end up not using it that much

It has clear sound but I wish it had a little more bass. Battery doesnt last long..Only about 8-10 hours so I have to charge it pretty much every day. I've already had to do a reset because it wouldn't turn on
Good sound. Study and waterproof too. Over time, I've purchased more and more, each for different rooms. Plus, you can pair two of them together using the iPhone app, for a stereo experience.
This was a birthday present for my wife. She is enjoying the great sound and the longevity of the battery life when using it. I highly recommend Bose.

I received one of these as a gift and liked it so much that I bought someone else this as a gift it's well worth the money as it is the best speaker I have ever you I like that you can still use it while it is charging the charge lasts a long time. I use it mostly for listening to Pandora.

Worked awesome. Great sound. As of 9/20 it will not charge or work while plugged in. All diff chargers and cords in the house tried. Other devices work with them.11 days after return window!!  Kinda sucks. I would give the sound and product 5 stars if I could use it.
This is an awesome speaker by Bose. It really rocks and the sound is exactly what you would expect from Bose. Great product! I going to purchase one more!

My wife and I used this to enjoy music during a recent long trip in our RV.  It worked great.  Easy to connect via bluetooth to our devices, really impressive sound quality, and cool looking.  Seems pretty rugged/durable.

We use this in the PACU (recovery room) for our patients. The Bose is invaluable. It is rugged, splash-proof and easy to connect. It also offers "Party Mode" with another Bose speaker. Party mode just means that you can connect more than one speaker to the same music source. Very nice option. Love this for my staff and patients.

Love love love this speaker! Sound quality is awesome! Very clear and loud. Great for an outdoor event. Distance wise the sound doesn’t travel that far. But for a deck or patio the immediate area will love the sound. Perfect for beach use. So easy to transport.

We love sitting on the patio having dinner and enjoying music from our new Bose .  We do have to charge the battery every night however.  It says it will last 7 hours.  Ours is lucky to last 3 hours :(.
I really like these speakers only issue is limited connection to my laptop

Great speaker sounds awesome for the size that it is but I had quite a few problems with it not wanting to charge I had to reset it quite a few times and then the last time I went to use it it's completely dead I tried all the resetting tricks I found on YouTube and through Bose but it's just dead. Not very happy I think the speaker should have lasted me a long time considering I didn't use it that often.

The sound and appearance really lives up to the good reviews online.  Simple to set up and use.  Don’t know yet about the battery life but very pleased just out of the box and using for a day!  Going to buy another for the office.

I own the original Bose Bluetooth Soundlink speaker and just love it.  Only problem is that it is not really designed to be out without cover.  I ran into this speaker in Walmart one day.  Loved its sound too.  I wasn't in the market for one yet so I passed on it.  Then Amazon Daze came and the deal was too good to pass up.  Got it and love it!
Greatest Father’s Day gift! Sound is perfect, connectivity is quick and efficient and long battery life. Packaging was perfect

I purchased this particular speaker because of the brand. I am very disappointed in Bose. The Bluetooth connectivity was awful. My phone did not stay connected with the speaker whenever I got a notification or call on my phone.

This was a gift to my sister . Her first real portable Bluetooth speaker . She told me She loves it. It is very easy to use and connects well . I bought my dad one a few years ago . He still uses it today .

So far I have been really impressed with this little speaker.  I upgraded from the prior version since mine would no longer hold a charge or charge.  I love that this speaker allows me to bluetooth with my phone and lets me know who is calling in case I can't see the phone.  I will not take this one outside, since I think that killed my prior one.  But I do recommend this for home, office or garage use.
Amazing sums this Bose Bluetooth speaker.  I’ve purchased several Bluetooth speakers over the years and nothing compares to the sound quality of Bose.

Bose quality sound in a tiny package. Not the least bit compromised.  Simple to use and a wonderful way to have music anywhere from my phone. Bring your phone battery extender because you will use this speaker a  lot.
so far  i love the size and sound.  but am having issues paring with XPS 15 dell.  it appears to be windows or dell issue...the speaker paired with phone easily.nice sound and light weight.

I haven't found anything in this price range that provides such quality sound. It was purchased to pair with the Amazon Echo and was surprised with it's performance. It actually sounds much better than the Echo. Pairing was quick and easy. It's very compact (for traveling) and has more than adequate (8hrs) battery life.
So irritating. This speaker will not connect with my LG g7 phone. It will connect with galaxy phone but its useless to me if it doesnt connect with my phone and cant tell me why.

Power button feels soft and broken in. I have the same model in black from amazon and the power button does not feel soft or broken in. It seems to be defective with the power button. It feels like it will break soon.

Very easy to set up the first time, and to use after that.  The sound quality is fantastic - as you would expect from a Bose unit.  You will not be disappointed with this product.  Nice size (small) and can be placed in small areas and be non-intrusive.  I bought this to have background music on when we have gatherings of people.  Used it 4 times already and am 100% satisfied.  Can't think of anything else that I need

I absolutely love the sound quality of this device! My favorite music comes through crystal clear, and I can now stream the news and weather from my phone and listen without missing anything while getting ready for the day.  Love it!

This little Bose speaker puts out really clear sound! I like to turn up music to clean the house, and I can crank this little guy up and carry it room to room. It is durable and connects via Bluetooth quickly. Worth the purchase!
This is a disappointing Bose product! Not loud enough for as much as it costs! My Blast blue tooth speaker is much louder and it costs less. Not worth the money at all!

I was amazed at the power of sound that comes out of this little speaker. Well it's not that little in the sense it has quite a weight for carrying around, but to use it while traveling or in and  around the house it's great.
Nice small Bluetooth speaker. Connects easily to my iPhone. The base is a bit weak. But overall very portable. It would be nice to have these with an integrated digital radio.
It stopped working 3 months after purchase.

I love everything about this speaker. The sound quality is amazing. I can connect it to my living room tv and carry it back to my bedroom and it never misses a beat! Charges quickly and holds the charge for over 12 hours.

I can't get this to pari up with anything!  I can't get it to keep a charge.  The bottom has come off.  I haven't used it one time!  Very sad as.I bought three of these as gifts and the recipients love it!!!  If I am not using it correctly, then it is too darn difficult!  Because I have tried everything!
I use this through my phone app with Spotify on the backporch. The sound is so good.  If I can figure out how it works with a phone App, anyone can use this.  Beautiful sound as always from Bose.
Bought this for myself and as a gift for my parents. Great loud sound with excellent battery life and the easiest Bluetooth pairing ever!

Streaming Sirius XM......sounds good; the only thing I wish it had.....treble and bass control...otherwise, impressive....I have Bose in my GMC truck, and in-house on my entertainment center.....So I am a BOSE fanatic.......don’t know about battery life yet..just got it and jamming to Hair Nation right now!!!  Who really gives a rat’s ____ about battery life?  Just plug the thing in!!Peace Out my Brethrin!!!
Battery life is not the best. Volume could be louder.Also,I let it run below 10% battery, now it will not charge at all, pretty pissed off.
I've had this for a few weeks now, and I think it's great!  I haven't had any issues with it, the sound is great and the connection is quick.

I don't know how this can be a true Bose.  I knew early the connectivity was bad but figured it was my fault.  My 25 yr old mechanical engineer son came in town recently and said something is wrong.  I spent $125 and am using my cord to connect device and speaker.  Bluetooth does not work.  Very disappointed.  I give it a 1 star because is is realistically useless as bluetooth which is main function.
The sound quality is excellent. Battery charge is rather weak. And while usually the speaker works consistently well, sometimes it loses connection to your device and is terribly slow to get it back.

This guy won't charge at all now that I've had it for 6+ months. The battery life was always suspect from the start, so maybe I got a lemon. Overall, it doesn't sound good enough to be worth the money or the trouble. Look elsewhere.

We have the first version of this and was very pleased but I use it at the office. The wife needed something for here workout area and sync to her ph and this has been perfect. Loud, no distortion, plenty of battery, excellent
I AM ALL ABOUT THAT BASS! Definitely get this speaker. It’s loud and has great bass.

I love this thing! Sound quality is amazing, water resistant so I can have it outside or take it to the beach. And the battery life is better than most. I bought a second one so I could have my music playing in the house and outside at the same time!

This product has irritating function of auto connect to you previously paired device. This means this will turn on the speaker when its in range of your paired laptop. Its irritating if you dont want to use the speaker.This funtion is even to told you by customer care when you contact them for this problem, I stumbled upon it while searching for solution and it was suggested that you clear your previous connected device list.Rest all is very good specially sound and built

I was using my Bose (wired) radio on the deck this past weekend, wishing I had a Bluetooth speaker. Then I saw this deal of the day. Good price so I placed the order. Arrived the next day. Connected quickly & I was listening to music/video on the deck. Count me as  another very happy Bose owner.

Tracks from the 60's do not always play clearly. This is obviously due to the limitations of the source recording (mono). Remastered tracks (Beatles) are perfect. The sound is fabulous and fills the room. The bass and highs are amazing. Highly recommended.

Sadly this product was amazing but within a month STOPPED WORKING! My daughter was devastated! Loved the speaker then malfunctioned and shut down unable to reset or charge! Very very surprised at Bose for this! I bought a Bluetooth speaker from Five Below for $5 and it hasn’t quit in over 4 years!

I can't believe something so small and sleek can pack such a BIG punch! Great bass sound and just overall quality. Could pump it all the way up and destroy my ear lobes lol. I am so happy with this purchase!

I just received mine last week. I charged it up and play it at work for 8-9 hours. I come home and play it while taking my shower or cooking dinner. This product is exactly what I have been looking for. Excellent sound. I love it. It can be used indoors and outdoors. Everyone who sees it wants one. No one believed me it lasted that long, until they heard it non-stop for 8 hours at work. Easy to connect and use. I simply love it
Bluetooth is always on which is weird. I constantly see Bluetooth probes even when I am using it with Bluetooth. Bluetooth never turns off.
Typical high quality Bose product.  A little pricey but you (usually) get what you pay for.  Sounds and works great.  Amazing how a speaker this small can fill up a room.  I would buy again.

Battery life is horrible. Stopped charging after the first time I used it. It would never charge again... basically never got to use it.... total waste of money. Do not recommend and I have heard so many people say the same thing about these just stop charging after no time at all!!!! Very disappointing! I used to like Bose. I have owned 4-5 of these, bought them around the same time, within a few months of each other and every one did the same thing. Stopped charging after just a few uses and one never would charge. We never were able to use it.

Boom!  This is my second one of these!  The first one was purchased about 4 years ago and I loved it....still works like the first day I bought it.  I needed another for my office....great price on Prime Day!

Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker II has a wonderful sound. Unfortunately not a good battery to match , fully charged it only lasts a couple of hours. In addition, it has this weird issue that you have to keep resetting it every time it runs out of battery.  It completely died on me a couple of days ago, just after 1 year, I expected it to last more due to its price. NOT RECOMMENDED.
Bought this speaker to listen to music in backyard. The sound quality is great, but it is not as loud as I hoped. I do recommend it if you have quiet backyard or listen inside the house.

Speaker is fine, but the software is awful. Have an ongoing issue where it will beep every few minutes. Should be able to disable the alert, but this isn’t an option. Also, if two devices are connected, no simple way to tell the system which one to play through the speaker. Instead, you have to disconnect if from the speaker, which is more of a hassle than it should be.
Me encanta este productoEl sonido es hermoso y suena bastante alto para ser tan pequeñito

Sound quality is awesome (to be expected with a Bose speaker).  It doesn't seem to hold it's charge for very long but does produce great sound for how compact it is.  Perfect for outdoor barbecue's, softball practice, the beach, as well as indoors while you're cooking or cleaning.
They last about a year with minimal usage probably less if used a lot. Just had my second one crap out just out of warranty. I’m pretty disappointed, I thought Bose was a good brand but I guess not

I'm not impressed.  This speaker is VERY glitchy.  Will connect sometimes, other times, not..  I've reset the speaker, gone to the Bose Troubleshooting site, and I'm still having problems. I've had it a week and I'm probably going to return it.

I'm past the return time for this item, otherwise I would have returned it.  Poor sound quality.  I have to adjust the volume for every song.  It's either too loud, or too low.  Not happy at all with this.

My sister and I both bought the Soundlink during Prime Day in July 2019. Mine stopped charging 2 weeks ago and hers keeps saying it's connected but won't play sound from there. We've never had this bad of an experience with Bose. We own multiple SoundLinks and headphones that have never had this problem. Very disappointed with these.

Super disappointed in this purchase. My GF bought hers directly from BOSE and it sounded amazing so I decided to buy my own.  I got mine on here, Amazon, so I’m not sure if that’s why theirs a difference in sound quality but it sounds SO muffled
Love this speaker!  Owned the first version and now updated.  Color is great, sound is awesome, durable, loud, great for outdoors.

Sometimes things go wrong and I did not receive my delivery when expected. I received it now and am happy for the product seems like I wanted it to be. Time will tell on the battery but everything else is Bose quality. Water resistance not yet "tested".
What took me so long to get one of these? ! I love it! Works great for my massage room and then I can bring it into another room! Very nice indeed.
Defective battery, completely died after 6 monthsNow I have to ship back to Bose and wait for a replacement. No longer in black so I have to get a Blue one
Does not connect to Alexa. It’s my fault, because I somehow misread and thought it would. Also, the music sound is good for such a small speaker, but the spoken word is very difficult to understand.
My son received this as a Christmas gift. I love it’s durability and the ease at which we can transport it from room to room. He easily connects any of our devices to it. Great battery life.
The battery life is terrible I got this in July I’ve used it 4 times and now it doesn’t work!! It won’t charge. This is cheap garbage.

The first time I bought the speaker it died in 3 months Amazon replaced it it hasn't even been two years I bought the 2-year warranty and the speaker is broke again and I cannot get in touch with anyone at Amazon to help me don't buy the speaker it's junk

I just got this item, used it for about an hour and now it doesn't work at all.  I purchased this for vacation that we leave for tomorrow.  I have tried all troubleshooting ideas and nothing works.  Needless to say I am beyond disappointed in this product and would rather use it for target practice.
It says it's paired but it won't pair consistently with blue-tooth devices. I'm having to plug it in with an aux cord to get it to play.

I was disappointed.  I was expecting better more rich sound.  I also notice the volume seemed to fluctuate with out me doing anything.  Also I felt like the drums were almost tiny on some songs that I know it shouldn't be.  Just didn't hear the quality that I expected.  It went back the same day I open it.  Also felt like it wasn't loud enough.  Especially for going out on the boat and having it bring the party to the water.

The sound isn’t near as good as my JBL Bluetooth speaker.  Also, this speaker randomly shuts off for no reason while in the middle of a zoom meeting or listening to music even though the battery is charged— not sure what that issue is.

Great product! Only complaint is that when two devices are connected at the same time, sound quality is interrupted or choppy. Also, the Bose always picks up all my Bluetooth devices so it will automatically connect (I have to manually disconnect constantly or turn off Bluetooth) leaving my phone silent. Super weird.

Went on a sailing trip and one of the people om board had this speaker.  It the quality of the sound was amazing!  Decided when I saw this on prime day to buy one for myself.  Can't wait to bring it on my trips.

Unlike other Bose products I own, this item DOES NOT jam. Turn the volume all the way up and it sounds like the speaker is busted. It rattled and sounds distorted. Turn the volume down a little and it produces the same quality Bose sound as expected.There isn’t much bass to the sound.

Pound for pound, the best speaker available.  I’ve tried a bunch of them; JBL, Oontz Angle, UE full line up, this beats em all. A speaker is about the sound and this one delivers. Full spectrum precision. Love it.
Way too quiet. Too small. Doesn't make sense to have this product anywhere in the house
Great for Paddling and camping ⛺️Enjoyed next to waters edge without having to make it too loud to bother others.
Bose made a mistake on this version of their Bluetooth speaker.  It is nearly impossible to read the function keys.  The older version is much better.
What a disappointment! the Speaker does NOT come on - the power is dead.  I followed all the "repair steps" and it still does not work - I am working on a refund!
I love to play music when I'm outside working with my horse.  The sound on this is great and it's easy to deal with.  The sound carries beautifully.
Great sound and small size - perfect! I would buy it again if I needed another one. I highly recommend it. Also, the finishing is amazing and it feels great at the touch.
Unfortunately, the battery did not hold a charge & I had to return it. I already own two of them & they are worth the buy. Maybe I just received a dud product.

Nothing bad to say about this product.  Our clients love it as we use everyday when we work out.  Sound is great and it's easy to connect to my phone.  Also, the battery seems to be pretty good as I do not  have to charge it all the time.  Definitely recommend this product if you are looking for a new Bluetooth speaker.

Very disappointed in this Bose product. The voice speaks at odd times whenever any device has a bluetooth turned on - scares the bejesus out of you. Also constantly repeats the battery level. Sound is not full, it's muddy and not of a good quality for Bose. Keeps it charge fairly well.
There’s no bass! Wtf type china Bose is this 🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️
130.00 for a Bluetooth speaker and it doesn’t come with a wall charger? The first Soundlink did! Super disappointed in that.
I have fallen in love so much with this speaker that I've purchased 4 of them in the last month for people as gifts.  This is an amazing speaker and I love it.

This is a real nice Bluetooth speaker. So portable and great sounding. It’s water resistant not water proof. But it’s great to take outside or on a trip . Very happy with this purchase. I would recommend it.
Purchase this pn prime days for my husband‘s 65th birthday he loves Bose products and he was not disappointed with this one had it a few days now definitely will update review as time goes bye

Sound and bluetooth connectivity were great.  Icons on top of the speaker are tiny. Mine quit after a month and after calling Amazon and being transferred to Bose support it would not reboot.  Bose support sent me links for the UPS label to print and send back with.  I hope the replacement is better.  Going through the customer reviews it is a recurring problem so beware.  Really disappointed with Bose.
I take this when i travel.  i really like the BOSE systems and this is great to take while i travel for work.  The sound is amazing and very clear..would recommend

Nice compact Bluetooth speaker , with great sound quality for web tv or booming some tunes , I paired up with my Mac desktop, fits neatly on my desk , very nice look ,  Not too big not too small, total package for what I needed, highly recommend!
This is a great Bluetooth speaker for the price. We have a few friends over every now and then and this speaker is perfect. I recommend this for gatherings or just relaxing outside on your deck.

The hardware is defective and the software (app) blows! What you have that women that worked for HP? She almost ran that company aground. Do not buy anything Boes! I hope to get my money back. I have 3 Boes speakers and 2 of them are defective.
This worked well for a few months and suddenly constantly gets staticky after a few minutes of playing. I’ve tried everything- really upset.

I bought this for a friend for Christmas and he loves it. The sound quality is beautiful and it is not too large or too small. He and his wife spend many hours on their boat during warmer weather and they plan to take this speaker with them. I may just order one for myself! You can never go wrong with a Bose speaker!
Exactly what you would expect from Bose. Tons of quality sound out of this little speaker. Easy to connect and play music from your phone.

Returned. Had it for less than a month before it died. Wouldn’t turn on and wouldn’t charge. Tried the reboot method and didn’t work. Didn’t bother to have exchange it coz it seems like everybody else is experiencing the same problem. Until Bose fix this major charging and connection issue that seems to be affecting most of their speakers, I’m sticking to my Sony speaker that’s been working fine with no issue for almost 5 yrs. Plus, the Sony speaker is much louder than the Bose and has a better connection

I LIKE THE SPEAKER, I JUST HOOKED IT UP TO MY TABLET, THE SOUND IS LOUD, I DID NOT HAVE A CHANCE TO LISTEN TO MUSIC, I TOOK OFF ONE STAR, BECAUSE THE VOICE IS A PAIN IN THE A////,  BUT VERY HAPPY WITH IT

This was a great unit for the first couple of charges.  Then it took a long time to charge and then simply no longer would charge at all... So I sent a letter about this to Amazon but I haven't heard anything from the seller or Amazon...So I'm not feeling good about this at all!
This is a great speaker, connects easily, battery life is great. Take it where ever you like, sound is fantastic.

Excellent sound. Use it as a speaker in the kitchen for cooking music. Love to dance while the food is being prepared! We loved the Bose sound so much that we also purchased a TV sound bar. Fast shipping.
Easy to use, easy to pair, sounds incredible!I bought 2 for my office, 2 for my house, and 2 for a gift for Christmas. Yeah, they’re that good!

Product I received was not new. did not have any plastic wrap in box and had hair and dust on it when opening. seems to work but always worry about longevity of a used electronic especially when it was marketed as new.

I have always looked for  a portable speaker of high quality at a reasonable price. This hit the mark. I am tickled its a Bose.  I'm a debating getting another to use the stereo feature.  The sound is excellent on a single one. I am imagining how great it will sound with two
When driving along I crank up my Bose and hit the road. I sing along at the top of my voice and the time flies by. One of the best things I've every purchased. I LOVE it.

Brought it as a Christmas gift for my brother this year and was amazed at the sound quality, fit and finish of this product.  when my U-Boom dies hopefully not too soon I will be buying one of these Bose speakers for myself.

This speaker has some kick. Nice clear sound and gets very loud. You can also hook it up manually without using the blutooth ( you have to have your own cord for that). It also does great for speaker phone. I love this speaker. Best one I have bought yet

Really easy to use and great-sounding speaker.  For such a small speaker, it has great bass response and has quite a bit of volume.  I've connected my Iphone 7, my MacBook, and my wife's Acer computer to it without a glitch.  Keeps its charge for ages!

This a well constructed unit.....but how do I turn it off.......REALLY turn it off???WHENEVER I turn on my laptop, the speaker (blue tooth) speaks and pairs up with my laptop. I wish I knew how to really turn it off to save the built in battery????

We did call the Amazon help line.  After not being able to determine why, after charging in 4 different locations with a light blinking once then stopping, that no charge was ever made in a 24 hour period, they said they would connect us with Bose, but they are closed and we will see what happens.  Bose has amazing products and have always been more than satisfactory, so perhaps we just were sent a lemon.

Great sound, the only default is the when charging, the there’s a consistent peep alerting you that’s the system is charging. You can here the peep from other rooms. Only flaw but strange that Bose didn’t think about that.
Easy setup. Excellent sound and distance (we use it outside). Allows for multiple users on the app. Great purchase. This replaced our wireless speakers that have a complicating setup.

I returned and replaced 2 speakers before receiving this one. Very happy!So much output for such little speakers.  I'm so satisfied with Bose sound quality that I exchange the Beat Pill for another Bose!!
Bose never disappoints.  Great sound quality. This little speaker gets pretty loud!  Not tailgate loud, but I can sing and drown my own voice out loud.  Very easy set up and connectivity.
It came way late but I do like this speaker a lot. When the battery dies it sounds messed up but other than that ok
Bose sounds awesome it works to blast the neighbors upstairs!! I have a 70s JBLs can’t listen to them here to big! Bose does a great job though! 😁
Venor refused to replace. Battery life is way shorter than advertised. Be forewarned —ead the other reviews here.Vendor insisted i send it to Bose. Bose never responded back.
Love the look, sound is ok. Cannot justify the high price. I would gladly pay $50-60 not over $125 each.  Battery Life disappoints

I got this for my husband when his Beats Pill started to deteriorate. Packs a serious sound punch in any size room and is easily paired with devices - Haven't tested the waterproof aspect to date but can't wait to try it out! I would rate the sound quality as better than the Pill and a bit lower in price! I would absolutely buy this again!!

Bought it to pair with my Echo Dot. Chose this particular speaker as it was on recommended by Amazon for pairing with the Dot. Kept disconnecting though we kept turned off the Auto Sleep feature and also kept the speaker plugged in all the the time. Disappointed.

First off, be advised that this purchase does NOT come with a wall charger, just the cord. So you better hope that you have the right wall charger for this, unlike me. I have to use my bf's one because for whatever reason mine is not compatible with Bose. That was the start....I've only had this device for about a month and a half when today it completely craps out. It fryed! This is the second Bose product I've owned that has been a total disappointment. DO NOT PURCHASE!
I love this speaker.  Paired easily with my phone & computer.  I have it in my office to play music while I'm working.  The small size is nice.  Does need to be charged fairly regularly.

I bought this for my 22 year old son for Christmas. It was easy to set up, turn on and use. It has marvelous sound quality. He uses is all the time and has told me frequently how much he really likes this gift.
Great sound, holds a good signal with fair distance from my phone. Nice projection without distortion. I've used it inside amd outside.
I love Bose and this little speaker is no exception. It can be loud if you want it --- with bass. Quality is fantastic. Works well with SPOTIFY music account for all your favorite tunes.
I've only had it 2 days but very pleased with the performance and ease of use. Exceptionally crisp sound. Easy blue tooth recognition and a wide volume range. May get a second one soon!
I dropped my Bose speaker and it quit working so I ordered another one and once again I am pleased with my purchase. Bose is the only brand for me. ☺️
Automatically installed when I plugged in n the USB cable. True plug and play. Beautiful sound.

The sound isn’t perfect. I’ve heard the sound from a bose wave, and it’s unparalleled. This is good, it’s loud, and the battery lasts pretty long. The music quality isn’t going to be as good as a $500 wave, and I get that.

I like the sound. But i had the old version of this speaker for years and it was better. If I dont keep the battery full charge it tells me low battery every 10 sec even when it's on the charger. Which essentially means I have to keep it plugged in 24/7 if i plan continuous use. The old one worked fine on a low battery as long as it was plugged in.

I love these little guys... take them with me to the beach, to cards, to the pool, everywhere!  Long lasting battery life, easy to pair with my iPhone or ipad.  And GREAT sound!  Lots of both lows and highs.  I listen to a lot of jazz and classical and hear it all.  Great investment.
I bought this and the jbl flip 4 to compare and returned the jbl speaker. Had the speaker for over a year now and still works well
Connects to bluetooth fine, but needs to be constantly charged, only lasts 2-3 hours.  Not ideal.  Expected a lot more from this brand.

I bought this because my son has one that I have borrowed on occasion.  I recently used mine in a large activity room at my church. It was amazing. It was just as good there as it was in my dining room. Battery life is as advertized.

Perfect for the back yard or in the home. Because of my hearing loss, I prefer this Square Bose I bought for my daughter over the Rectangle Bose Box I have for myself. This Bose seems to be louder, yet both give a crisp sound and are well worth the purchase price.

I was so excited about this when I ordered it but very disappointed with many aspects. It never stays charged, so you just have to keep it plugged in while using. After three months, it started turning itself off, while plugged in and claiming to be fully charged. So it's not basically useless. I don't recommend, waste of money

My art studio is a dance party since I got this speaker. The sound is great and the battery life good. It takes up very little space, so it fits in anywhere with no wires getting in the way, unless its charging. Love that colour. Hot pink?

Sounds good on the higher end sounds, and best with jazz, acoustic, and classical music. Low to no punch/bass. It does not sound as loud or crisp when playing rock, pop, or hip hop.Disappointed in the lack of volume and clarity when listening to it outside.
Great sound in small package.  love how it announces what it is connected to.  and that it can connect to two devices.it worth it.  you can make it plenty loud.

We returned it within an hour. We've had several Bose products over the years and they all were great. Except SoundLink Speaker II. I is programed for way too much base. And after looking online, there is no downloadable fix.
started feedback buzz  when plugged inworked fine a couple years--maybe buy protection
Great sound for the size and price.  I am very happy with the purchase.

I have used this speaker in every room of the house. It is easy to move around and regardless how loud it plays, the sound is clear as a bell. I am never disappointed with Bose products. It syncs easily and the range is amazing. It picked up my Bluetooth signal from several rooms away which allowed me to keep the phone on the charger. :) I am looking forward to summer when I will be using this at the pool. Great buy.

I love my Bose speaker. I don't know honestly how much money I have spent on speakers for me and my guest to enjoy music around the pool and yard. I have had no problem what so ever. I did get the warranty and I haven't fiquired out when I will receive the info. But I just love mine
The speaker is not as clear as I had expected especially since it is a Base product. It is good for a small space, however I would like something a little more powerful for my living room area.

Speaker sounds great and looks great.  However I have had to get the unit replaced from Bose twice because the battery will die and not charge if not used for a couple weeks.  Bose has great customer service and will replace with a brand new unit if under the 1 year warranty.The white color looks different than the picture.  It has a bluish gray tint .

I went through a few speakers before this one. My fault, they were cheap ones. This one works great. I love it. It tells you when you turn it on how much battery it has left and before it dies it tells you it’s low plug it in. The sound quality is really good too. I’m glad I finally spent a little extra and got this one.
We love this speaker! We use it everywhere. It has GREAT sound, especially for how compact it is.
Bose quality is consistent. Easy to connect and the sound is terrific! I got the aqua blue and am very happy!

Im so disappointed i had the bose sound color original and i saw that the second one came out so i thought to myself i need to get it. I instantly regret buying this purchase unless this issue can be fixed. I just recieved my brand new speaker and i fully charged it and was using it, it was amazing untill then my speaker needed to be charged. I tried charging it it wouldnt work so it never charged again. I looked up anything i can do to fix this tried everything but nothing worked. Im utterly disappointed in this product and this purchase
Hooks up easy with Bose Connect which I downloaded from Google Play. Great sound like you would expect from Bose.

I would expect a lot more in the sound quality based on the Bose brand. I replaced a JBL speaker and would purchase that over Bose after listening to both extensively. Bose needs to step it back up vs manufacturing to price points.

Love Bose sound technology. My third Bose system, the original radio with CD player 10 years plus and sounds like new. The computer speakers are awesome, 10 years and still kicking. Now the Bose Bluetooth small with beautiful sound, anywhere in the house.

Another quality product by Bose. Waterproof feature is great for use outdoors in the rain. Bluetooth connection is much easier than earlier versions of the Sound Link. Pairs easily with my laptop or smart phone without any effort.
Sound is great.  Perfect size to sit basically anywhere.  Love the yellow citrus color better in person.  You won’t be disappointed.

I don't write positive reviews often enough and I am so pleased with this purchase. So here it goes, this speaker exceeded all of my expectations. The sound is very good and the bluetooth is the best I have ever used. I was pleasantly surprised that it also works very well as a speaker phone. I use it exclusively with my iPhone so if you are using it with a different source you may not have as good an experience.
LOVE! The sound quality is outstanding. And it doesn't take up a lot of space. After one charge it's lasted for 3 days so far and being used at least 3 hours a day.
Long battery life after a full charge!  The best quality I've heard from a portable bluetooth speaker and...I've had 3 different ones.  Buy far worth the money!!!
Love the sound but had to buy another after a year because it stopped charging.  Before buying the product again, I tried a cheaper brand but it didn't get as loud or have the quality sounds.

Overall a great speaker. I will admit I returned this for the non-waterproof ColorLink Bose speaker and am even happier with it, but if you need something that is waterproof this IS a pretty solid speaker.

I purchased this item a few months ago.  Had a problem inserting the power cord from the start but item worked.  Then, a few months in, the speaker died.  It wouldn't charge even when plugged in.  I tried resetting the system per the instructions and this didn't work either.  Have always loved Bose products but this speaker is the worst.  Do not purchase this item!
Battery will not charge beyond medium. Charge lasts for 20 minutes. Speaker dies even while plugged into charger. Investigating return options now.
Love the sound quality. The power button is super soft and I worry that it was crack and break within a short amount of time
My husband and I have been using this for a couple of years now and it’s worked great. It can go up pretty loud. Battery life is decent.
This is the 7th Bose product in my home. I have the first version of this speaker and got this one for my boyfriends birthday. He loves it. The sound is great for the size and so is the price.
It does come with a power cord!!  Someone it was packaged under the piece of foam but we found it.  Sound is great and the charge lasts 8 hours.
Product malfunctioned and the Bose customer service rep was horrible. Amazon's customer service team made it right and I am grateful for that, thanks guys!

Fabulous! Fantastic! Unbelievable! Like having a $$$$ sound system in your house! I'm old(!) and even I could set it up it was so stupid simple with one notable exception; it asked me to press the multi purpose button and I didn't know which button it was and there was nothing in the instructions naming the buttons! I told you I was old!! Please spend the money to buy this speaker. I've owned the $29, $49, and $89 ones and they never have enough sound to hear other than for personal use. They also have to be charged to use. I just plugged it in the wall, it found my iPhone then I created a 6 hour playlist of Christmas music on it and pressed play! No applications to download and it plugs into a wall outlet or can be charged for portability. I left my iPhone plugged into the wall while it plays to keep the battery up but it is not necessary to do this for it to play. It's everything and more I hoped it would be!! I have a huge house and the sound fills 6 adjoining rooms with a clarity that sounds like I'm playing directly from a disc on a dedicated sound system. Don't even bother to look at the others in this category. This one is IT!!
Bought this for my wife.... LOVES IT !!!  Crazy sound quality !!  Bought her a large BOSE speaker for a wedding present (she had always wanted one) but it isn't portable...problem solved !

The speaker provides very clear sound when listening to music or lectures. I previously had a Philips speaker, and I can tell that this one has better clarity when played at higher volumes. I also like the color and size because they fit well in any room as a decoration that isn't too obnoxious.
Can’t complain just wishing that the battery lasted a little longer
A great little speaker. Works well with adapter too. It is nice looking and appears to be of good quality, so far.
You get what you pay for!After wasting money on 3 different inexpensive speakers I bit the bullet and bought a BOSE!  Wow!  Easy to use and REAL sound. Thank you BOSE!!
So easy to use And fantastic sound for the size!!!Also love the Bose App that allows one to connect 2 of these dynamite little units to play in stereo!!!

I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She absolutely loves it. She is a singer and is asked to sing all the time. She wanted a speaker to use for background music when she sings and this speaker works perfectly for that. She would have been happy with most speakers and wasn't expecting this one because of the price. She was so excited when she got this one. Like most things, Amazon got this speaker to her fast.
This is a replacement for some cheapo thing that I bought years ago from another supplier.  This has great sound quality.  I wish it held the charge longer, but it still is awesome.  I love it!
Great by me with definitely buy again big sound little device easy to connect with Bluetooth what else can you ask for anyway I don’t expect less It’s Bose

The sound quality is nice. But I continue to have issues with Bluetooth connection. It’ll say it’s connected but plays absolutely nothing. This happens every time I use it, which isn’t often. And I’ve only had the speaker for 6 months. I don’t know why this Bose product is much poorer quality that the others.

I've always been a big Bose fan, but this is the first one I think is just "okay". The sound didn't wow me, for the size and the price, I expected a better sound. I have many Bose systems, which I paid much more for, but still expected more from this box.
Can’t go wrong with Bose but battery life is rather short. But overall I’m happy with the purchase.
I wish the bass was a little stronger.  Other than that it’s good for such a small size.  Connects effortlessly.
Replaces the Soundlink I purchased several years ago saying that one was really, really out dated!!This one is fantastic & works much better than I thought!
Awesome little speaker with the biggest sound! Take it everywhere.

I work in the yard or grill out and have this usually with me.  Headphones I don't like for they block outside noise.  Live in the mountains and like to hear also what's around me or what my dogs are into.
Exactly what I wanted. Clear, full sound, small and compact, strong stable Bluetooth connection, great battery life. Highly recommended.
It was the best graduation present! My grand kids can play their playlists on their phones and hear it by the pool.
This speaker is awesome. I plugged it in and paired it with my iphone. It was ready to go within 1 minute! I use it with apple music. The sound is great. Definitely recommend.
Great sound!  I am a fan of Bose speakers however I wish the battery life was longer on this model.
Love how I can take this speaker everywhere I go and on trips too.  Seriously, where I go it goes!  Great sound and easy to use.  Best purchase I've made in a long time.
After a few months of happy use, the bluetooth now tends to refuse connection to my chromecast and macbook.Works fine if you're just wired in, (but then there are much better non-bluetooth options).

Amazing sound.  Great base, but still good with higher frequencies.  Can't believe it's such a little speaker.  It will be easy to throw in my suitcase when traveling.  Glad I spent the extra $$ over a cheap on.  I'm very happy with it's size, sound, look, and convenience!

For its size, this is a great speaker. It is portable and easily connects with any Bluetooth device you have. The sound quality isn’t as great as some of Bose’s larger speakers But for its size it is outstanding.
Battery didn’t work upon arrival. Charged overnight and no luck. Complete waste of time and money
Speaker was nice. But, it stopped turning on after 16 months  None of the fixes Bose offered worked. Just a few months outside the warranty. Go figure wasn’t even used that often

Surprisingly powerful, full sound, light and portable, connecting range again suprisingly good. It has become my best friend for around the house. Haven't taken it outdoors yet, but I have no doubts it would perform quite well on a picknik. I love it love it love it, highly recommend it. It is a bit pricey, but boy is it worth every penny.
This is my second Boze. This one would not stay connected. It did not work well at all. I loved my first one that died after only a few years. Do not know which one to buy? Very Very upset.
This is a great small, portable speaker. Typical Bose quality sound. Multiple purchases. Great gift
This speaker is just okay.  Expecting much more, sort of underwhelmed.  Thought about returning it, but I'll probably keep it.  Meh.

With just a quick download of the App (it's free) I was able to play my music. I'll be honest I did t think this would be a good speaker, i was really surprised at the sound quality only complaint the color I get is more or a salmon... but I'm ok with bright colors so I still say MUST BUY

I have been a loyal Bose fan for 25 years and will always be unless I see this in the future. The sound quality is not at all what I’m used too and I had several unsolicited comments as well. I have had the Bose revolve and other smaller blue tooth speakers so I sent this one back and I’ll try the larger units again.  The battery life is poor and the usb outlet on the unit was misaligned.
I got this for my grandson!  He loves it!  His mother? Not so much!! Lol. But it does have great sound quality.

Bought one for my daughter's family.  I heard the sound and bought one for myself.  This is an amazing speaker that we take everywhere - on the patio, in the boat, and to the park.  If it wouldn't get dirty so easily, I would give it 5 stars.  It does clean up nice . . . so far.  I recommend downloading the Bose Connect app.

Love this little speaker. We got it to use by the pool and it works perfectly. We have also used it inside to connect to a phone and play music. Also a bonus is you can connect more then one phone so you don’t have to unpair a phone every time you want to change who is controlling the music.
Wonderful sound in a small package. Just what I was looking for. Lives up to the Bose name.
Great of course!  It's a Bose.  Looks good (inconspicuous), sounds good, and perfect size for my small condo.
I knew I would like this (I mean it’s Bose....c’mon!), but I absolutely love it. Sound is perfect, stays charged for a long time and the price is right. Got it on Amazon days for 40 bucks off!

Excellent BOOM for your buck. This sounds amazing. I was so surprised...my husband had to temper my excitement by saying “what did you expect? It’s a Bose?” I’m getting another for that surround sound atmosphere.

Worked great for the first 3 times we used it, but is now dead. According to the Bose forums, this is a common problem. None of the suggested fixes are working, so we now have a very expensive paperweight.
Excellent sound and features.  Connected easily, however MAC users require an extra step to change to bluetooth external speakers, but easy to do with one click.

Love BOSE for their quality sound, even have the old nylon Soundlink speaker (which is amazingggggg) wanted a cool new (affordable) version to take camping.. sadly If you’re looking for BASS this is not the speaker for you. It made Led Zeppelin sound raspy and muffled (which in my opinion may as well be against the law to use those words to describe them!!) it’s ok though,sending it back and thinking of trying out the Revolve or Revolve+. Still a huge BOSE lover!
This was the second Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker that I have ordered.  If your device is bluetooth ready, it sets up like a breeze.  Great sound!

I purchased this speaker June 22 it stopped working 6 months later on December 27th. I tried resetting the speaker it will not charge or turn on at all. This is a known issue with bose. I would Google bose color 2 not charging before you buy. I replaced this speaker with a jbl yesterday.

Love the sound and the fact that they can be paired to get stereo. The only thing that I find disappointing is the battery life.Bose sound quality is so good, you would think they could work out the battery issue.

Everything about this little speaker is as expected from a Bose product. Use it in my workout room, perfect for a small room. And actually used it out on my quad while working outside. Although the space outside kind of swallowed up the sound it was still nice having some tunes instead of using my phone with headphones. Pairing was a breeze also, very much recommend this speaker for the right space...

Love my Bose soundlink speaker II. I upgraded to  this newest design. Highly suggest keep battery charged. I had to research how to manipulate the buttons to get speaker to turn on when battery was depleted. A must for the office.
I mostly use it while I’m in the shower. The sound quality is great (no complaints). I don’t like the built/in voice system, It’s a bit too low quality.
although I like the speaker, had I known about the spyware with their app I would have likely chosen a different product.  I uninstalled the app and the speaker works well without it.  Good sound
This and the Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones were gifts for my boss.  My chances of a bonus are looking pretty, pretty good.  He loved them.
I purchased this so I could listen to the radio when I am in the shower. It is awesome. Pairs easily.I can hit the mic button to answer calls from my cell. Worth the money spent.
Great sound quality for the price and connects to Bluetooth devices flawlessly. It’s compact size also makes it ideal for travel, camping, and outings at the park.

I’ve had this speaker since May 23rd. The 3rd time I tried to charge the speaker it wouldn’t even turn on. I bought a new charging cable and it still doesn’t work. The sound quality was good while it lasted. Unfortunately, I missed the window for returning the speaker.  I have other Bose speakers and they work and sound great. Too bad about this one but I won’t purchase a new one.
We use this as our Google Home speaker for the kitchen. Love it! You can connect multiple devices at once without disconnecting others. Great quality, sturdy feeling speaker.
Five stars all the way! Great sound, looks good and fairly priced. Battery lasts and lasts!!
This,This.. The quality is amazzing. The sound of the music when played out of it is Amazing. It connects to my Bluetooth  everytime.

Everyone else has a sound cube so I wanted one. Good bass, highs a little muffled. I love the soft skin. Feels great. I keep it by my bed so I can listen to stuff while I drift off to sleep. I wish it had an automatic off if no audio but no biggie.
My wife said this was a terrible Christmas gift, but she uses it ALL THE TIME. I use it when she’s not home for movies and shows. It’s super loud and has great tone. It’s super sturdy.
Works perfectly for me. Only wish it was louder. I think you need to buy a set of two to experience these to their full capability...will buy another eventually

No bueno!  I have always had Bose systems as they are the best BUT this one is cheaply made and the quality isn't as good as the mini for just a little more money.  I thought.. it's Bose and a lil cheaper so why not even if the sound is n't as good but.. nope.. it is not even close in sound performance and it literally stopped working after 2 weeks!Don't waste your time trying to save money here.
Easy to sync. Great sound and long battery life! Bought this two weeks ago. Charged it once and still haven’t need to charge it again.
Perfect little travel speaker. I love Bose. I love how good it sounds in my house even if I'm not traveling to somewhere. Bluetooth connection works well. Very happy.
It's easy to connect and sounds good in a room. Sound is not as big as Bose speakers usually put out but for my purpose it's to extend my phone so I like it
Love this speaker. Great sound. Only gave it 4 stars because I feel like the battery doesn’t last that long.

Received my speaker today. Came earlier than expected and set up was a breeze! Took me all but 2 minutes. Have it paired with my IPhone and now can’t wait to hook it up to my Apple TV ( hope that works) because my tv has a horrible tinny sound. Sound is superb! Happy I picked this böse over the cheaper available speakers out there.

This is a great little portable speaker. I use it around the pool and don’t have to worry about it getting wet. It is a great color and the sound is really very good. It connects easily via Bluetooth to my iPhone. Highly recommend.
Great speaker for the price. Instantly connects via Bluetooth.
I thought I had a good product. However, Product is less than a month old and does not charge. Absolutely money wasted. I need to return product even if I don't get a Refund.
We love Bose speakers and were excited to find this one on sale for prime days. I love the color, the sleek design and the quality/sound of Bose
I am really enjoying the sound, size and portability of these speakers! I use it everyday and have had it for over 2 months.

Bose is the best brand on the market.  I bought this to link to my receiver for use with my DVD player and TV.  So far I can't get it to work for my purposes.  I was able to pair it with an I-phone that worked just fine.  The sound is Bose quality and top drawer.
I have a Bose and love it. I have had it for 10 years. I let my brother borrow mine and when he moved I bought him this one. If you love to jam this is a great speaker! Can't go wrong with BOSE.

Sounds great for the size. It's light and clearly well-made. I've purchased several less expensive blue tooth speakers, and they never last more than a months. This one is going strong, definitely worth paying a little more!
The portability is great! I take it to the bath. Outside. I use it for better tv sound. Worth the money!
I bought this during prime day when it was listed for a great discount. It sounds great and pairs up with my iPhone quickly. Would definitely recommend.

I compared the sound quality with my 10 year old Bose SoundLink Mini, the richness, death and richness delivered by the Mini was totally missing with the new Bose Link Color II. Disappointing at best.

Really should come with more instructions. Also a USB outlet charger would be nice considering the cost. So you have to use of your existing or buy one.  Once  figured some things out sound is great, battery life is mediocre.
I use this in my shop to stream music from my phone. I have not used the battery so I didn't rate it for battery life.
The sound is incredible for the price and form factor. Just wish there last one lasted a little longer.
This speaker is awesome sounding! The sound and range is incredible! Good purchase!

We love this speaker! The sound is crisp and clear. It  is the perfect portable size for carrying with you and not getting away, and it’s classy enough to look good sitting in the house. We carried it to the lake and it was loud enough to hear, even while playing in the water, far away from the dock. Love the midnight (navy) blue! It’s a must have! Perfect summer accessory!
Ordered one of these as a gift for our daughter and then had to order one for ourselves! Great product! Super pleased and the sound and portability are awesome!

Ordered this Bose because I love my other Bose speaker. It’s an older version and a little heavy, and wanted something that was safe near the pool. This was the perfect combo. Ordered it & am not disappointed. The sound quality is amazing. I hadn’t it running for 6 hours & it’s still going strong. Easy to connect to via Bluetooth. Actually tells me who’s calling when I get a phone call. Over all I would definitely buy again & recommend. As always, Bose is worth the money.
My 17 yr old grandson bought this. I was amazed at the sound capacity! Nice!
This small wireless speaker looks smart, sounds great, connects very easily. Can even access FM Stations via the phone app.  Has a great range to the phone.  Very happy with this purchase.

The product worked very well and I was very happy with it. I went to use it one day and there is something inside the speaker that is loose now. I have had this product for about 8-9 months and I really liked it although I am disappointed  with how long it lasted. Generally I buy Bose products although I will rethink this based on this.
Decent sound and was able to connect to music sources with some difficulty.  Ceased to work at all in less than six months.
I hesitated giving the sound quality 5 stars but there isn’t an option for 4 1/2.  I do like it and for the money, it’s a great buy!

I take this everywhere around house and yard.  Easy connection to bluetooth so I'm able to listen to music, podcast and even audible books while working or just relaxing.  During parties we pair it with my sister's to get a full sound in the house or backyard.
I had the first gen for years and lost in the divorce. Bougt this one and LOVE IT. Vibrant color. Vibrant amazing sound. Great battery life

Bought this and it quit charging. Had a replacement sent. The sound on this speaker isn't as great as other Bose products that I've purchased. I have another Bose Bluetooth speaker that has lasted me years. It was left outside in ND elements for a year (thanks Hubby) and still works like the first day I bought it.

So far the battery life seems fine, but the Bluetooth connectivity is extremely glitchy. The speaker keeps turning on after it has been repeatedly turned off. In addition, the sound quality is not as good as speakers around half the cost; e.g. the JBL Bluetooth speaker.

Purchased as a means to listen to my records in rooms apart from my stereo but the bluetooth function wouldn't allow any control over the volume coming from the Bose speaker.  An older Bose speaker, now discontinued, works like a dream but I think everyone should be aware that this one may not.
I wanted ‘‘tis for my self but but as a bday present for my daughter she loves it
A little black box, literally, that produces powerful and clear sound.  Really happy with this Bose.

I loved this speaker until it stopped working. I bought it end of December and in March it stopped working. I tried to reboot it and changed the charger cord and still does not work. Since I bought it through amazon, bose cannot do anything. I am very disappointed and upset, waste of money.
This is a wonderful bluetooth portable speaker! It is very convenient for its size and portability. Love it!!

I am pretty disappointed this item and the mini speaker I bought for my son. They have both stopped working out of nowhere with less than a year's use. They won't charge or even turn on while plugged in.The Bose site lists instructions to 'reset' the device but it's not working.

It sounds like it's playing with something muffling the sound with too much bass....Unfortunately you can't change that on the app. Needs lower bass, higher treble, battery life is short, so you'd need to keep it near a power source.
Don't just buy one of these! Buy 2 and link them together in Stereo mode. You will be amazed how good these sound.

Constantly talks during the night, this thing connects and disconnects to my computer all night and the talking wakes me and my wife up. Finally we put it in the shed. You can’t actually turn it off either. Even after hitting the power button it tries to connect. Wouldn’t recommend!

I really like the sound of this speaker and how easily it is to take with you anywhere. I recommend purchasing the speaker if your looking for something to hook up to your bluetooth device and have the sound fill the room. The Bose quality that is in this little speaker is amazing. Glad I made the purchase and would buy it again. The only thing I don't like about this speaker is the battery life is only about ten hours, so I need to charge it for work daily. But it's worth it.
I use this while teaching music to young children from a cart I have to wheel around  the school. It sounds perfect and is so easy to use. I want them to hear the best and this is it!
This speaker does not come with a power cord.  REALLY?!!!!  How hard would it be to include the power cord?!!!What good is the speaker if you can't charge it?!!!  Ridiculous!!!
Love it!! It's a nice size to keep around and to bring to other places. The sound is awesome !!
Fantastic! Very loud capability, which helps when outside! Love the size and material. This is a great gift too!! Reaches fairly good distance in my house from myPhone too
I’ve always wanted one of these Bluetooth speakers. I’m not disappointed. What great sound
I'm normally a fan of Bose but I must say that they really failed at this one. The sound quality is similar to cheap brands I've heard. I'm really disappointed in this model.
Excellent speaker for the beach! It’s waterproof and easy to handle.
Got for a gift.  Linked easily with my iPhone blue tooth. Nice sound.  Love it’s portability.

Great while it lasted, which was unfortunately only a little over a year. I loved the size/portability and the sound quality, but for the price I would have expected for it to last years, but it just recently just stopped turning on and won't charge. It also had trouble pairing with multiple devices. I would not recommend this speaker.
Sounds better than what I was expecting.  Excellent bass and sound clarity.  So much better than the computer plug in speakers I was using.

Usually Bose has makes high quality products. This does not have traditional Bose quality sound, there's not much base.  I have a cheaper speaker with better sound.  I was also very much over charged.  I see it for half the price elsewhere.  However- I like that it's water resistant, and it's a nice shape and material.  Bluetooth also works pretty good.
